K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:468b-1: shr'i mam rakta ya m'a ri tantra r'a dza n'a ma /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:468b-3: dpal ldan gshin rje gshed dmar po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:468b-4: gshin rje mthar byed dmar po la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:468b-5: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:468b-6: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gcig tu 'dres par gyur pa bdag med ma'i bha ga la bzhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:468b-7: de la mgrin par dam 'khyud de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:468b-8: rang nyid sems can ched zhus pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:468b-9: kyee rdo rjer gsungs pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:468b-10: thar pa de bzhin sdom par yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:468b-11: 'dus pa la sogs rgyud du yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:468b-12: slar yang ches mang du gsungs kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:468b-13: sems can bsam pa yongs rdzogs byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:468b-14: da ni bdag gis rab bshad bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:468b-15: kha cig rgyal srid 'dod pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:468b-16: tshe ring nad med phun sum tshogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:468b-17: zhi ba la sogs las rgyas pa; ;sna tshogs rgyud du gsungs pa yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:468b-18: gang yang mngon par spyod pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:468b-19: dgra yi sde nyams byed pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:468b-20: sprod dang 'gugs dang gsod pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:468b-21: sna tshogs rgyud du ma brjod pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:468b-23: khyod la phan pa'i thabs gzung phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:468b-24: bshad bya lha mo gus bcas nyon //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:468b-26: rtag tu rgyal srid thob bya ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:468b-27: ji srid nyi ma zla ba bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:468b-29: da ni ming gi spyod yul du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:468b-30: khu ba rengs dang sde 'gugs dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:468b-31: mkha' spyod nyid dang mchog tu myur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:468b-32: de yi sman ni bshad par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:469a-2: gnyis par snying rje de bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:469a-3: gsum par dga' ba bsgom par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:469a-4: bzhi pa btang snyoms rnam bsgom bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:469a-5: 'jig rten chos rnams brgyad po ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:469a-6: yongs btang stong par bsam par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:469a-7: slar yang stong nyid byang chub ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:469a-8: gnyis pa la ni sa bon bsdu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:469a-9: bzhi par yi ge dgod pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:469a-10: ra yig las byung nyi ma la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:469a-11: h'um byung sna tshogs rdo rje 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:469a-12: de nyid kyis ni rdo rje yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:469a-13: ra ba zhes dang de bzhin du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:469a-14: sa gzhi rdo rje bcings pa 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:469a-15: dang por stong par bsgom par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:469a-16: de nas yi ge ai dmar po yongs su gyur pa las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:469a-17: de'i steng du yi ge h'um dmar po'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:469a-18: de'i steng du rlan dang bcas pa'i mgo bos brgyan pa'i dbyug pa'i dbus su h'um yig dmar po'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:469a-19: der yang nyi ma la h'um yig go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:469a-20: de las nges par byung ba'i 'od zer rnams kyis nam mkha'i phyogs su dpa' bo'i gzugs de la 'jig rten gsum pa thams cad bsdus nas slar yang de nyid du bcug ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:469a-21: dpal gshin rje gshed dmar po'i gzugs su bdag nyid bsam par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:469a-22: sku mdog dmar po g-yon brkyang zhing rnam par 'gyur ba'i zhal mche ba gtsigs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:469a-24: klu brgyad kyis rnam par brgyan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:469a-25: dbu skra dmar ser gyen du 'bar ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:469a-26: rked pa'i phyogs su stag gi pags pa 'dzag pas rnam par brgyan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:469a-27: mi'u thung gsus pa 'phyang zhing 'jigs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:469b-0: spyan gsum @469b ba shin tu 'jigs par byed pa dmar po 'bar ba'i rgyun mi zad pa 'od zer sna tshogs kun tu 'khrugs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:469b-1: g-yon par sred med kyi bu la sogs pa'i khrag gis gang ba'i thod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:469b-2: g-yas par bdud bzhi rnam par 'joms par byed pa'i dbyug pa dkar po dang klu'i rgyan la sogs pas spras pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:469b-3: rdo rje ro langs mas phrag par 'khyud pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:469b-4: 'dod chags chen po gcig tu nges par rgyas pa dang mtshungs pa gang yin pa'i rje btsun gyi gzugs so /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:469b-5: rje btsun ma yang de dang 'dra ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:469b-6: khyad par du mgo bo skam pos brgyan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:469b-7: bcom ldan 'das ni 'dzag pa dang bcas pa'i mgo ba'i rgyan dang ska rags kyang grol bar gyur pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:469b-8: ma he dmar po la g-yon brkyang gi zhabs kyis gnas par bzhugs pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:469b-9: phyi nas bcom ldan 'das las skyes pa'i rtse gsum pa'i dbyug pa dkar po'i dbus su slar yang sa bon kha dog dmar po bsam par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:469b-10: phyi nas bcom ldan 'das kyi rdo rje yang h'um yig las skyes pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:469b-11: slar yang bcom ldan 'das ma'i gsang ba'i padmar yang padma 'dab ma brgyad pa dngos su a'a:yig gis rdzogs par mtshan pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:469b-12: de'i rjes su gsang sngags rgyal ba'i bdag nyid can ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:469b-13: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa nu r'a ga na badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma konyham/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:469b-14: lte ba'i 'og tu padma dmar po 'dab ma brgyad pa kha dog dmar po'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:469b-15: der yi ge hr'i:dmar po nges par son pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:469b-16: spyi bor son pa'i re pa dkar po slar yang bsam par bya zhing bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu la gzhug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:470a-1: rje'i lam der son par blo bzang pos bsam par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:470a-2: phan tshun gnyis gnyis snyoms par zhugs pas ro mnyam pa'i sa bon gyi gzugs can no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:470a-3: sa bon de lha mo bzhis rang gi gzugs su blang ba ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:470a-4: shar la sogs pa'i phyogs bzhi rnams na gnas pa de rnams rang gi bdag po la blta zhing slong bar byed pas lha mo thams cad blang ba'i ched du glu'i mchod pa byed par blta'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:470a-5: thugs rje'i khro bo rje btsun nyid bzhengs shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:470a-6: sa gsum mtha' dag rmongs pa sol mdzod cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:470a-7: rdo rje tsa rtsi k'as so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:470a-8: jo bo bdud bzhi po ni las rgyal ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:470a-9: sems ni g-yengs so rje btsun nyid bzhengs shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:470a-11: 'jig rten mgron gnyer stong nyid bzhugs sam ci //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:470a-12: rje btsun 'jig rten bsod nams nyid kyis bzhengs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:470a-13: dbyangs can ma yis so; ;byang chub rang bzhin 'jig rten mgron gnyer nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:470a-14: khyod nyid stong nyid sems shing ci la bzhugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:470a-16: rab tu sad par byas nas slar yang de la rab tu bzhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:470a-17: de'i 'og tu de la khu ba'i tshogs gyur pa las bdag nyid lha'i bdag nyid can ma he dmar po'i steng na de yang gar gyi nyams dgu dang ldan pa bandhu ka'i me tog lta bu drag po zhal gcig pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:470a-18: phyag gnyis pa mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:470a-19: dmar la zlum pa'i spyan gsum pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:470a-20: smar la dmar ser 'jigs par byed pa mi'u thung gsus pa 'phyang zhing 'jigs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:470b-0: dbu skra dmar ser gyen du brdzes @470b pa; lngags 'dril zhing khrag 'dzag pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:470b-1: smin ma gnyer zhing drag tu bzhad pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:470b-2: mgo bos mtshan pa'i dbyug pa dkar po g-yas pa'i phyag gis 'dzin pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:470b-3: phyag g-yon pas myos byed dang khrag gis gang ba'i thod pa 'dzin pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:470b-4: nyi ma bye ba'i gzi brjid dang mnyam pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:470b-5: g-yon brkyang ba'i zhabs kyis gnas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:470b-6: gshin rje 'jigs shing bsdigs par mdzad pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:470b-7: ma he'i rgyab na gnas pa brgyad gnyis lon pa'i rnam pa can /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:470b-8: klu brgyad kyis rnam par brgyan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:470b-9: mgo bo'i phreng ba dbu la bcings pa mgo bo'i phreng ba rab tu 'phyang ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:470b-10: stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs can /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:470b-12: bcom ldan 'das kyi gzugs dang kha dog 'dra ba la gri gug dang thod pa can phyag rgya lngas rnam par brgyan pa'i lus can mar brtson pa'i sems kyis bsgom par bya zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:470b-13: de nas nga rgyal byas na bdag nyid grub bar 'gyur bar the tshom med do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:470b-14: de nas badzra sva bh'a wa a'atma konyham gis gsang sngags bklag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:470b-15: de nas bcom ldan 'das mas rjes su chags pa chen pos yan lag dang nyid lag thams cad rnam par bltas nas padmar rdo rje gsor te gnyis ka'i stag wags kyi na bza' 'phyar bar bsgom par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:470b-16: de la 'di dag rjes su chags par byed do zhes byas nas rdo rje padma dag sems la byin nas h'um dmar po yongs su gyur pa las rdo rje rtse mor aom yig ser pos byin gyis brlabs pa rab tu bsgom par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:471a-0: a'a:yig dmar pos padma de'i ze'u 'brur @471a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:471a-1: la a'a: yig gis byin gyis brlabs pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:471a-2: de nas aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa nu r'a ga na bdzra sva bh'a wa a'a tpa konyaham zhes bzlogs nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:471a-3: rdo rje padma mnyam par sbyor pa las bzhengs par bdag nyid bsgom par bya te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:471a-4: phyi rol gyi gnyis gnyis bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:471a-5: de nas 'pho ba'i gnas skabs na bdag nyid du bsgoms pa'i lha mo'i padma'i khongs su dus mnyam par 'dzag pa'i khams gnyis 'dres par bsgom par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:471a-6: dkar po dang dmar po de dag yongs su gyur pas gti mug gshin rje gshed la sogs pa rnams bdag nyid ji lta ba bzhin du padma'i dbus su bsams nas bcom ldan 'das ma las skye bar bsgom par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:471a-7: de'i 'og tu de rnams mdun du bltas nas rang rang gi gnas su so sor gnas par bsam par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:471a-8: de nas shar gyi 'dab ma'i nyi ma la gti mug gshin rje gshed tsartsi k'a nag mos 'khyud pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:471a-9: lho'i 'dab ma'i nyi ma la phra ma gshin rje'i gshed ser po pag mo ser mos 'khyud pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:471a-10: de yang phag pa'i gdong pa can no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:471a-11: nub kyi 'dab ma'i nyi ma la 'dod chags gshin rje'i gshed dmar po dbyangs can ma dkar mo dang sbyor ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:471a-12: byang gi 'dab ma'i nyi ma la phrag dog gshin rje'i gshed sdo bsangs goo r'i ma dang snyoms par 'jug pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:471a-13: yang na thams cad kyang gshin rje'i gshed dmar po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:471b-0: ro langs ma dang mtshungs par bsgom par @471b bya'o; ;me ru mu men gyi bu ma pa bzhi mnyam sbyar bas gang ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:471b-1: bden bral du gser gyi bum ba gla rtsis gang ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:471b-2: de bzhin du rlung du byi ru'i bum pa sihlas gang ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:471b-3: dbang ldan du dngul gyi bum pa ga bur gyis gang ba ji lta ba bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:471b-4: thod pa gang ba bltas nas nyi ma dang zla ba kun rdzogs pa dag la'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:471b-5: 'di nyid bde ba chen po dang zung du 'jug pa mchog las gzhan pa ma yin pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:471b-6: de nas rang gi snying gar padma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:471b-7: nyi ma la gnas pa'i h'um yig las skyes pa de'i 'od zer rnams kyis dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo la mchod pa kun gyis mchod nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:471b-8: dza:h'um bam ho:zhes pas bden par dgug pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:471b-9: gzhug pa la sogs pa dang mchod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:471b-10: sems can rnams thams cad bla ma'i man ngag ji lta ba las so zhes rnal 'byor gnyis pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:471b-11: de nas phyogs bcur bzhugs rnal 'byor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:471b-12: rnal 'byor ma tshogs de rnams la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:471b-13: blo dang ldan pas sbar bzhin dgug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:471b-14: mchod cing dbang bskur la sogs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:471b-16: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis dbang bskur bzhin pa la spyan ma la sogs pa rnams kyis kun dga' ba'i thugs kyis sna tshogs par gyur pa'i glu la sogs pa dang gar gyis bdud rtsi lnga'i gang ba'i bum pa rnams kyis /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:471b-17: dbang bskur rin chen chen po la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:471b-18: khams gsum pa yis phyag byas pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:471b-19: sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang gsum gyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:471b-20: gnas las byung ba sbyin par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:472a-0: dkyil 'khor ba thams cad kyi dbu la khu ba @472a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:472a-2: rdo rje sems dpa'i rgyas btab par bsam mo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:472a-7: phrag dog rnams kyis gsol ba 'debs par byed pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:472a-8: kye kye gshin rje'i gshed dmar po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:472a-9: bla ma srin po'i gzugs rang bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:472a-10: kho bos khyod mthong rnam par 'jigs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:472a-11: bla ma khro bo'i rang bzhin spongs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:472a-12: khyod kyis gar mdzad sa stengs dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:472a-13: sa bla dang ni sa 'og g-yo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:472a-14: chags pas brgyan pa'i khro bo yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:472a-15: gar mdzad khyod ni ro langs lags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:472a-16: sku ni sbom thung dmar po ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:472a-17: rnam pa sna tshogs sku sprul pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:472a-18: rdo rje dbyangs can ma yis btud //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:472a-19: gar mdzad khyod ni bde ba che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:472a-20: hr'i:sht'i gsang sngags dag gis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:472a-21: khyod ni sa gsum 'khrul pa sel //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:472a-22: rje btsun snying rje'i khro bo lags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:472a-23: gar mdzad khyod ni 'gro la gzigs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:472a-24: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta p'u dza badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma ko nyham zhes so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:472a-25: de nas sngar bzhin du rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi steng du me'i dkyil 'khor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:472a-26: de'i steng du aom yig yongs su gyur pa'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gsum gyi steng du a'a:yig yongs su gyur pa las thod pa bsgom par bya'o zhes so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:472a-27: de'i dbus su bdud rtsi lnga dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:472a-32: nyal sogs pa dbyug pas dkrugs pas ro mnyam par byas la tshos nas rgya skyegs kyi khu ba lta bur blta'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:472b-0: aom a'a:h'um zhes pa 'dis bsil bar gyur par @472b byas nas h'um yig yongs su gyur pa'i lce sbu gu can bsams nas btung bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:472b-1: rang rang gi kha yis ni lha mo'i kha ru sbyin par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:472b-2: dkyil 'khor pa rnams kyis kyang bsams nas kun tu spyad par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:472b-3: de nas bdud rtsi myangs pas yang dag par dgos par gyur nas phyi nas gsang sngags bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:472b-4: snying gar gnas pa'i sa bon dang mtshan ma bstan par byas nas gsang sngags bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:472b-5: aom hr'i:sht'i:bi kri t'a na na h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:472b-6: zhes pas ji srid 'dod par bsams nas bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:472b-7: ldang bar 'dod na rang gi lus kyi 'od zer gyis sems can gyi don byas nas thams cad bdag la rab tu bcug ste yid kyis gshin rje'i gshed lhan cig skyes pa'i rnal 'byor gyis ji ltar bde bar gnas par bya zhes pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:472b-8: lhan cig skyes pa'i gshin rje gshed kyi rnal 'byor gyi gnas skabs ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:472b-9: bdag nyid kyi gzugs lta bu rang bzhin gyis grub pa'i gshin rje'i gshed du rgyal byed par brjod par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:472b-10: rang bzhin gyis grub pa'i zhal gcig pa phyag gnyis pa gshin rje gshed kho na nga'o zhes so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:472b-12: rnal 'byor bzhi brjod pa 'dis thun gsum nyid kyis sam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:472b-14: de ltar mngon par 'dod pa'i dus su rtag tu yongs su rdzogs pa'i bar ji srid du'o zhes so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:472b-15: de nas 'bum phrag gi mthar mtshan thog thag tu bzlas par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:472b-16: sngon du bsnyen par byas par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:473a-1: las thams cad pa'i thabs kyi cho gas mar dang sbrang rtsi dang me tog dmar pos stong phrag bcur sbyin sreg bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:473a-2: re re zhing gsang sngags bklags nas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:473a-3: aom hr'i:shtr'i:bi kri t'a na na mantra siddhi mme de hi t'i h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:473a-4: de nas gsang sngags kyi sngags kyi dngos grub tu 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:473a-5: las thams cad kyi dngos grub bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:473a-6: dmar po zhes pa'i lha la sogs pa'i le'u ste dang po'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:473a-8: bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag rgya che'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:473a-9: dngos grub ji ltar 'gyur ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:473a-10: rnam pa ci yis bsgrub bya ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:473a-11: de'ang bcom ldan 'das gsung du gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:473a-12: kha yis kha la 'o byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:473a-13: phan tshun dam po yis ni 'khyud //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:473a-14: mchog tu dga' ba'i gzugs kyis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:473a-15: dga' ma bshad par bya yi nyon //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:473a-16: gar byed pa'i 'byung gnas rnal 'byor bdag nyid kyi gzugs gang yin pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:473a-17: bcom ldan 'das mchog tu rnam par ma chad par 'bab pa ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:473a-18: dper na chu klung gi rgyun rab tu 'bab pa bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:473a-19: 'dir ji srid du bsgoms pa las skyon sngags bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:473a-20: bcom ldan 'das kyi gzugs gal te myur du grub par 'gyur gyi gzhan du ma yin no /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:473a-21: ji srid du 'di'i dngos grub kyang phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub kho na de'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:473a-22: 'di rnams kyang rnal 'byor goms pa kho nas thams cad sgrub par byed kyi gzhan du ma yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:473b-0: goms pa'i @473b sbyor bar 'gyur ba ni skyes pa dang byung ba dang ma byung ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:473b-1: sngon du gnas pa rnams thar pa'i don dang 'dod pa'i don rnam pa sna tshogs pa dang sangs rgyas nyid kyi dngos grub kyang skye ba 'di nyid la'o; ;las thams cad yongs su spangs nas der son pa'i yid du gyur nas ji srid rang nyid 'ongs nas smra bar byed de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:473b-2: kye kye sgrub pa po mchog ci yin pa de scal bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:473b-3: de nas mchod yon byin nas phyag byas te dngos grub blang bar byas ba de sbyin par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:473b-4: aom hr'i:sht'i:bi kri t'a na na a'a gatstsha a'a gatstsha h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:473b-5: de nas rdo rje ro langs ma sgrub par 'dod na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:473b-6: rdo rje langs ma'i gzugs brnyan byas te ras sam 'bras bu la byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:473b-7: rje btsun gyi kha dog dang dbyibs su thog mar yang dag par gnas te ji ltar 'byor pa'i mchod pa byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:473b-8: de dag rang rang so so'i gzugs ma 'dres pas kun tu mthong ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:473b-9: ji srid du 'ongs nas sgrub pa po la 'khyud de smras pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:473b-10: kye sgrub pa po khyod kyi bka' bsgo pa ci lags /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:473b-11: sgrub pa pos mchod yon byin nas smra bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:473b-12: bdag gi chung mar 'gyur ba'o zhes pas chung mar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:473b-13: de la longs spyad pas gshin rje gshed kyi gzugs su grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:473b-14: aom dve sha ra ti a'a gatstsha a'a gatstsha nu da nu da tru ta tru ta h'um dza:sv'a h'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:473b-15: yang na aom bdzra be tta li a'a gatstsha a'a gatstsha h'um dza:sv'a h'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:474a-0: gzhon nu ma lo bcu drug lon pa yan lag bzang mo bag mar blangs pas @474a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:474a-1: sam; skyed nas skal ldan mar byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:474a-2: dbang bskur ba'i rnal 'byor ma sngags kyi sgom pa'i tshul gyis yang dag par mchod de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:474a-3: lag pa g-yon pas 'khyung la rnal 'byar ma'i gzugs su bsams na sa ji srid du 'bar bar gyur ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:474a-4: de nas de la bzung nas gshin rje'i gshed kyi gzugs su grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:474a-5: aom bdzra betta li dzva lam h'um dza:sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:474a-7: de nas gti mug gshin rje'i gshed sgrub par 'dod na gti mug gshin rje'i gshed kyi cha lugs su byas nas g-yas pa dang gcig shos kyi rkang pa'i mthil gyis padma mnan te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:474a-8: ji srid du kye sgrub pa po zhes bos nas bka' bsgo ba ci lags zhes smra bar byed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:474a-9: ci bgyi bar 'gyur zhes smra ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:474a-10: de nas brtsams te 'jig rten gsum gyi rgyal srid kyang ster ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:474a-11: dngos grub gzhan lta smos kyang ci dgos /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:474a-12: de bzhin du phra ma gshin rje'i gshed dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:474a-14: phrag dog gshin rje'i gshed sgrub par 'dod na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:474a-15: de bzhin nyid du 'bras bu sgrub pa'i gsang sngags ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:474a-16: aom mo h'a ya m'a nta kri ta a'a gatstsha a'a gatstsha h'um h'um phat phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:474a-17: aom bi shu na ya m'anta krita a'a gatstsha a'a gatstsha h'um h'um phat phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:474a-18: aom r'a ga ya m'anta kri a'a gatstsha a'a gatstsha h'um h'um phat phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:474a-19: aom a'i rshya ya m'a nta krit a'a gatstsha a'a gatstsha h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:474b-1: de nas gti mug dga' ma sgrub par 'dod na gti mug dga' ma lta bu'i sngar brjod pa'i lha mo'i gzugs ma he la zhon pa bdag nyid dang lhan cig ba byas nas sngar bzhin du mnan te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:474b-2: ji srid du 'ongs nas ci bgyi bar 'gyur ro zhes smra ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:474b-3: de nas brtsams nas sgrub pa po mngon par 'dod pa phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro zhes so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:474b-4: de bzhin du phra ma dga' ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:474b-6: phrag dog dga' ma bsgrub par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:474b-8: aom mo h'a ra ti a'a gatstsha a'a gatstsha h'um dza:/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:474b-9: aom bi shu n'a ra ti a'a gatstsha a'a gatstsha h'um dza:/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:474b-10: aom r'a g'a ra ti a'a gatstsha a'a gatstsha h'um dza:/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:474b-11: aom a'irshya ra ti a'a gatstsha a'a gatstsha h'um dza:/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:474b-14: aom bdzra tsa rtsi ke a'a gatstsha a'a gatstsha h'um dza:/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:474b-18: bdzra goo r'i zhes bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:474b-19: de nas gnod sbyin sgrub par 'dod na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:474b-20: de'i tshe 'jig rten gyi dngos grub sgrub pa'i 'du shes kyis gnod sbyin gyi gzugs brnyan byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:474b-21: de mnan te bsgrub par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:474b-22: bka' bsgo ba thams cad phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:474b-23: de bzhin du gnod sbyin mo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:474b-34: gzhan yang mngon du bsgrubs par byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:474b-35: aom hr'i:shtr'i:bi kri t'a na na che ge mo s'a dha ya sa dha ya h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:474b-37: de nas rdo rje dbyug pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:475a-1: skar ma rgyal la rdo rje'i dbyug pa shing las byung ba sor mo sum cu pa'i dbyug pa byas nas ba byung lngas byugs te tsandan dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:475a-2: me tog gi phros bas nye bar mdzes par byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:475a-3: gang de thog mar ral gri'i tshul gyis bzung nas ji srid du 'bar bar gyur pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:475a-4: de nas dbyug pa 'dzin par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:475a-5: gshin rje'i gshed dang mtshungs par pha rol gnon to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:475a-6: aom hr'i:shtr'i:bi kri t'a na na bdzra danda dzva la ya dzva la ya h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:475a-8: de nas thod bsgrub par 'dod na gshin rje'i gshed shing gi gzugs thod pa sor mo sum cu so gnyis pa byas nas sngar bzhin du lag pa g-yon pas thogs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:475a-9: lag pa g-yas bas g-yogs nas ji srid du 'bar bar gyur pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:475a-10: 'bras bu ni de lta bu kho na'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:475a-12: ka p'a lam dzv'a la ya zhes pa khyad par ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:475a-13: de nas dbyug ba'i phyag rgya bsgrub par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:475a-14: de'i tshe lag pa g-yas pa khu tshur byas nas sdigs mdzub brkyang par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:475a-15: de'i phyag rgya bcings nas ji srid du 'bar bar 'gyur pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:475a-16: de nas gshin rje'i gshed kyi gzugs kyi dngos grub tu 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:475a-18: dandam mu tr'am dzv'a la ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:475b-0: 'dod pa lnga po thams cad la nye bar longs spyod pa nyid kyis thams cad @475b bsgrub par bya'o zhes te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:475b-1: ji ltar rnyed pa'i dam tshig gi rdzas bsam pa rab tu rdzogs pa'i don du bza' bar bya zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:475b-3: yang nas yang du gang ci'ang rung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:475b-4: de kun gdon mi za bar yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:475b-5: bza' bya thams cad btung bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:475b-6: phung kun gshin rje'i gshed la dbul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:475b-7: zhes pa dngos grub chen po sgrub pa'i cho ga'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:475b-8: de nas dngos grub phran tshegs sgrub par 'dod na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:475b-9: de la zhi ba can la sogs pa bsgrub par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:475b-10: grog la yang lan brgya rtsa brgyad du bsngags pa'i 'o mas rtsibs bcu gnyis pa'i 'khor lo so so tha dad pa mngon par bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:475b-11: de'i shar sgo nas brtsams te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:475b-12: g-yas bskor gyis yi ge bcu gnyis bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:475b-13: aom hr'i:shtr'i:bi kri t'a na na h'um h'um phat phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:475b-14: dbus su chu'i sa bon bam yig bri bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:475b-15: bam yig gnyis kyi kha sbyar la bsgrub bya'i ming de'i dbus su bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:475b-16: phyi rol tu yi ges bskor bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:475b-17: de nas kha sbyor du byas nas skud pa dkar pos dkris nas myos byed kyis dkris te brgya rtsa brgyad du byin gyis brlabs la 'o mas gang ba'i bum par bcug ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:475b-19: ji ltar 'byor pa'i mchod pa byas nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:475b-20: aom hr'i:shtra'i:bi kri t'a na na ba de ba datta sya sh'antim ku ru h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:475b-21: zhes bzlas pa bya ste zhi bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:475b-22: 'jig rten pa rnams kyi sdig pa dang nad yla sogs pa nye bar 'tshe ba grong gi phyogs bcu rnams su /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:476a-1: bi kri t'a na na gr'a ma aa mu ka sya sarbo pa dra wa sh'a ntim ku ru ku ru h'um h'um ba lim grihna grihna phat phat sv'a h'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:476a-2: zhes pa 'dis lan bdun du byin gyis brlabs nas gtor ma'i che gas sbyin par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:476a-3: phyi rol la sogs pa sngon du byas te 'o mas sbags pa'i sbyin sreg grong gi dbus ji srid par byas na nye bar 'tshe ba thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:476a-4: de nas rgyas par bya bar 'dod na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:476a-5: sngar bzhin du 'khor lo gnyis mngon par bris te yi ge bcu gnyis po rnams kyi dbus su bhr'um yig dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i sa bon bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:476a-6: de'i dbus su bsgrub bya'i bo shat gnyis kha sbyar ba bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:476a-7: phyi rol du gur gum gyis gru bzhi pa'i ri mo gsum gyis bskor bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:476a-8: de skud pa ser pos dkris nas brgya rtsa brgyad du mngon par bsngags te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:476a-9: mar dang sbrang rtsis gang ba'i bum par bcug nas sngags bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:476a-10: ji ltar 'byor pa'i mchod pa byas nas sngags bzlas par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:476a-11: aom hr'i:sht'i:be kri t'a na na bhr'um boo shat lha sbyin gyi pu shtim ku ru boo shat h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:476a-13: ji srid du nor 'phel zhing rgyas par gyur gyi bar du'o zhes pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:476a-14: sngags bzlas pa'i bar ma chad par zho'i zan gyis sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:476b-0: de nas dbang du byed par 'dod na sngar bzhin du 'khor lo gnyis la sen rtsi'i khu bas yi ge bcu gnyis po rnams mngon par @476b bris te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:476b-1: dbus su hr'i:yig ku ru kulle'i sa bon no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:476b-2: dbus su ho:yig gnyis kha sbyar ba kun bri'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:476b-3: phyi rol tu gru gsum pa'i ri mos bskor bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:476b-4: de nas srad bu dmar pos kun tu dkris nas brgya rtsa brgyad du byin gyis brlabs la ma mar dang sbrang rtsis gang ba'i kham phor la rgya skyegs kyi khu bas bris te bcug nas ji ltar 'byor ba'i mchod pa byas nas sngags bzlas par bya'o /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:476b-5: aom hr'i:shtt'i:pi kri t'a na na hr'i:ho //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:476b-6: lha sbyin gyis lha sbyin la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:476b-7: wa sha m'a na ya ho:h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:476b-8: zhes ji srid dbang du gyur gyi bar du bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:476b-10: lan tshva dang lhan cig pa'i me tog dmar po dang ldan pa'i sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:476b-11: de nas gong bu dgug par sems na dur khrod kyi sol ba dang sa'i gzugs brnyan gyi dbus su sngags dang de nyid kyi ming snying gar bcug ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:476b-12: rkang pa'i mthe bos mnan nas bzlas pa bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:476b-13: 'di kho na bsgrub bya'i gong bu zhes ji srid du gong bu khugs par gyur gyi bar du bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:476b-14: sngags la ni; wa sha m'a na ya'i gnas s'a a'a karsha ya h'um zhes pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:476b-15: ho:yig gnas su dza:zhes pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:476b-17: aom marme marm'a aa bi gha te aom tsa rtsi ke ha ra ha ra bu kkam m'a ra ya m'a ra ya che ge mo'i ched du dza: aom gam bhi ri tsa rtsi ge pa h'um sho ni ta pr'i ye gam bh'i ra che ge mo la dza:/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:477a-0: shing gcig gam dur khrod dam ri bom ru lhor mngon par phyogs pas gcer bur byung nas brgya rtsa @477a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:477a-2: de nas 'grub par the tshom med do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:477a-3: bcom ldan 'das sngags kyi cho ga ji lta bu /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:477a-4: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:477a-5: dben par gcig pu can du gyur pas rje btsun gyi bris sku rab tu gsal ba'i phyogs bcur gnas pa'i bla ma dang sangs rgyas dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:477a-6: byang chub sems dpa' rnams mngon sum du byas nas mi'i rus pa bcad pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:477a-8: bya rog chen po'i khrag gis sor mo bcu gnyis pa'i rtibs bcu gnyis pa'i rnam pa'i 'khor lo'i dbus su rlung gi sa bon no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:477a-9: de'i khongs su dgra'i ming rnam par bcad pa dang bcas ba kha sbyar la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:477a-10: bya rog gi mgrin pa la bcings nas gal te ma bkrol ba de'i tshe tshar gcod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:477a-11: de'i tshe tshar ma chod na de las bon bcu gnyis bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:477a-12: phat phat h'um h'um na na t'a kri bi sht'i:hr'i:aom//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:477a-13: ji ltar 'byor ba'i mchod pa byas nas stobs po che sa gdug pa byin nas gal te rgyun la bskur bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:477a-14: gal te ma yin na khva ta'i gshog pa la lan bdun du bsngags te khyim gyi sgo ru ming nas smos na 'phral du skrod par byed de de tshar gcod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:477a-15: de bzhin du rtsibs bcu gnyis pa'i 'khor lo'i dbus su tsha ba gsum dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:477b-0: bud shing gi me'i sa bon gyi dbus su rnam par bcad pa dang bcas pa'i ya @477b yig gnyis kha sbyar la tha yig gnyis kyis phyi rol nas bskor te me'i shing gi ma la gdung bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:477b-1: de bu khye'u'i steng du bzung na de'i skad cig la 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:477b-2: gal te ma yin na mi'i rus pa sor bzhi pa la lan bdun du mngon par bsngags par byas nas dgra'i sgor zla bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:477b-3: de yis khyim nas skrod par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:477b-4: de bzhin nyid du sa bon bcu gnyis yongs su gyur pas rtsibs bcu gnyis pa'i 'khor lo'i dbus su tsandan la dzi wa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:477b-6: gzhan gyis mi thub pa'am 'khri shing gi chu'i sa bon gyi dbus su de nyid gnyis kyis kha sbyar la tha yig gnyis phyi rol du bskor bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:477b-8: 'o mas bkang bzhin du r'a dz'a ta dang me tog dmar po 'bum phrag gcig la 'chi ba med cing de las gzhan du yang r'a dz'a ta de'i dngos po 'gro pa med do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:477b-9: de'i tshe bdag nyid mtshams med pa lnga byed pa yang bral bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:477b-10: yang na shing se pha la'i 'bras bu dang ldan pa lta ba'i me tog dmar po rnams kyis de bzhin nyid du sa bon bcu gnyis kyis yongs su gang ba'i kham phor du bzhag nas bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:478a-0: mi bdag rgyal po la sogs pa rnams @478a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:478a-1: 'bangs dang 'bangs mo'i dngos po 'gro bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:478a-2: gshin rje gshed dmar po'i rgyud du thun mong gi zhi ba can la sogs pa'i cho ga'i le'u ste gsum pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:478a-3: de nas mnga' bdag dam 'khyung cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:478a-4: tshems kyis ma mchu 'tshir mdzad pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:478a-5: de la bdag med mas sems can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:478a-6: don phyir phan byung zhus pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:478a-7: bcom ldan ji ltar sems can rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:478a-8: ji ltar rgyal po rnams su 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:478a-9: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:478a-10: lha mo ngo mchog pa'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:478a-11: khyod la bshad par bya yi nyon; ;ya yig dang ba yig dag las kyang gzhan du skar ma rgyal gyi gzhi pa la la btika byed du bcug la skar ma rgyal las sa gsum po bsgrub par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:478a-12: rgyal rigs kyi rigs kyi khyim lnga ru gsang sngags stong phrag bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:478a-13: rnal 'byor ma'i rdo rje nyid ma bsang gtor dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:478a-14: rang gi gsang sngags sgrub pa ni sngon du khri bzlas pa'i sgrub pa las so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:478a-19: m'a li ka la bsnyen pa 'bum phrag gcig dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:478a-20: de bzhin du bcu'i cha shas kyi sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:478a-21: rdo rje'i sa la 'bad pa las slar yang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:478a-23: phyogs rnams su rnam par gzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:478b-0: dbus su rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa gsang sngags la brtson pa mnyam par gzhag pa'i rnal 'byor @478b pas gang sngags kyi lha'i bdag nyid rnams la nyer spyod lnga'i mchod pa rnams kyis dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:478b-1: phyogs bzhir rdo rje thod pa rnams su yang dag par gang ba'i gtor ma byas te phyi rol tu phyogs kyi gtor ma byas nas de bzhin du bgegs la phur pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:478b-2: mchod sbyin gyi shing las byung ba'i dbyug pa rnams kyis 'gyings pa dang bcas pas gsang sngags klog go //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:478b-3: phyi rol du yang de nyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:478b-4: ngos bzhi'i phyi rol tu bram pam gram shing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:478b-5: gtor ma sbyin pa sngon du 'gro pas dril bu dkrol te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:478b-6: de bzhin du klog par byed pa'i klog pa po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:478b-7: sgrub pa po bzhis gar byed pa la brtson pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:478b-8: nyams pa dang 'gog pa zhes so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:478b-9: s'a lu la sogs pa lnga bza' ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:478b-10: bza' ba ma yin pa dang bcas pa med do zhes pa bsod nams rnam bzhi shes par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:478b-11: ji ltar dbye bar shes par bya ba ma yin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:478b-12: yongs su gang ba'i thod pa ru chang gi btung ba cung zad bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:478b-13: thab tu yang blo dang ldan pas sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:478b-14: ji ltar gsang sngags mnyam par gzhag pas dpa' bo'i dbang po nyid bsgrub par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:478b-15: de nas sbyin sreg 'bum phrag gcig byas na gal te 'dod na phyi rol gyi thun mong gi 'khor los sgyur ba thob bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:478b-16: 'di nyid kyis nyis 'gyur gyis 'gyur ba 'dir the tshom med do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:478b-17: de nas lha mos gsol pa phra mo'i rgyal srid thob pa la dgra 'byung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:479a-1: yis lha'i dbang po yid kyi shing rta yang dag par rdzogs par 'gro ba lags /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:479a-2: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:479a-3: gal te snying rje dang ldan pa sems can gyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed par 'gyur pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:479a-4: gal te dge 'dun mchod pa'i tshogs kyi bza' bar bya ba yang rjes su nyin rer byed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:479a-6: sems can mchod par byas par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:479a-7: sngags kyi bsam gtan la brtson pas dang por dbang bskur bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:479a-8: rang gi snying po dang nye ba'i snying po'i gsang ba'i sngags rab tu sbyin par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:479a-9: thun mtshams gsum du gtor ma drug cu rtsa bzhi ba byin nas ji lta ba bzhin du bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:479a-10: bya ba'i rang bzhin des sems can mchod da ji lta ba bzhin du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:479a-12: gsang bar byas nas rang gi mchod sbyin gyi mthar gtor ma dbul bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:479a-13: sngags kyi bsam gtan la brtson pas rnal 'byor ma bzhis mchod pa mang po dang dbang bskur bar yang bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:479a-14: rgyan lnga dang ni yang dag ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:479a-15: rtag tu myos byed mang po dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:479a-16: gri gug dang ni thod par ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:479a-17: kun tu stag lpags sham thabs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:479a-18: s'a li rnams kyis kha bkang nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:479a-19: kha nas kha yi nang du sbyin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:479a-20: sgrub po gcig ni rgyal kun brgyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:479a-21: g-yon pas dril bu dkrol byed cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:479a-22: g-yas nyid rdo rje gsor bar byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:479b-0: khu @479b lnga yi ni tshad kyis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:479b-1: bris sku lnga po gyis shig dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:479b-2: gti mug phra ma 'dod chags dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:479b-3: phrag dog kha dog dbye las bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:479b-4: dkar po ser dmar sngo bsangs rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:479b-5: rang rang gzugs la bri bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:479b-6: dbus su gshin rje'i gshed bri'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:479b-7: sngags la mchog tu gzhol ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:479b-8: sprang chen snag tsha byas nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:479b-9: mchog gi rus pas bri bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:479b-10: aa yig dang ni ba yig dag 'bum phrag bzhi po yang dag rdzogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:479b-11: thab khung gru gsum pa'i dbus su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:479b-12: sbyin sreg sngags la mchog gzhol ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:479b-13: phyir gzhan slob dpon bzhi rnams kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:479b-14: de bzhin thab tu 'dab gsum gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:479b-15: phyi nas sa bon bcu gnyis dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:479b-16: de bzhin 'khor lo bcu gnyis la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:479b-17: sngags kyis bon bri bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:479b-18: gro gsod bcu drug nyid la'ang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:479b-19: ming med kyi ni khrag nyid la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:479b-20: sen rtsi yis ni bsres pas sam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:479b-21: yang na rgya skyegs khu bas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:479b-22: ya ma r'a dza sa do me ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:479b-23: ya me do ru na yo da ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:479b-24: ya da yo ni r'a yakshe ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:479b-25: yakshe ya tsa ni r'a ma ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:479b-26: lha mo gsang sngags rnyed dka' 'di; ;bdag gis ngo mchog par bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:479b-27: 'di yi sngags kyi mthu stobs kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:479b-28: bdag gis sangs rgyas nyid sgrub ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:479b-30: gsang sngags brtson pas sbyar byas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:479b-31: sde dang bcas pa bar snang la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:479b-33: gshin rje'i gshed dmar rnal 'byor pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:479b-34: kha cig rtag tu dam tshig brtson //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:480a-2: 'bum du bzlas pas bri bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:480a-3: pho nyas shar gyi dkyil 'khor du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:480a-4: kham phor gnyis kyi dbus su mar dang sbrang rtsis yang dag par gang ba la bzhag nas zho'i zan dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:480a-7: nub kyi 'dab ma la de dang mtshungs pa'i kham phor la me tog dmar po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:480a-8: sen rtsi dang rgya skyegs kyi khu ba bsres pas sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:480a-9: byang phyogs kyi 'dab ma la sbrang chen gyis gang ba'i kham phor la yang dag par bzhag nas thab khung gru gsum du shing si ttha ka shu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:480a-13: ske tshe rnams kyis sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:480a-14: dgu yi bdag nyid can 'bad pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:480a-15: dang por dam tshig byas nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:480a-16: rgyan lnga yis ni brgyan pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:480a-17: rnal 'byor ma yang de dang mtshungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:480a-18: sna tshogs rin chen rang bzhin brgyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:480a-19: rnga yab dkar pos brgyan pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:480a-20: lag pa dag gis rdor dril yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:480a-21: yang nas yang du gtor ma sbyin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:480a-22: ji ltar kha cig yon phul bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:480a-23: gang gis mnyes par 'gyur pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:480a-24: dbus su'ang de dang mtshungs par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:480a-27: dman dang zhan la rjes brtseb //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:480a-28: so sor bdag ni dam tshig mchod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:480a-29: shes rab bcas shing yon dang bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:480a-30: rigs ni lnga po rnams kyis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:480b-0: de nas zho bcas bza' @480b ba yi; ;me la sbyin sreg bya ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:480b-1: blo bzang 'bad pas gzhag mi bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:480b-2: dbyug pa lhan cig de sgo bzhir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:480b-3: rnga bo che yi sgra bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:480b-4: gang dang gang du sgra thos pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:480b-5: ro la sde ni rab bros nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:480b-6: rna ba rnams ni gsal bar byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:480b-7: mig gis mthong bar mi byed cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:480b-8: sde rnams dbang du byed pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:480b-9: mgo la zug rngur 'gyur ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:480b-10: skrod pa dag ni byed pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:480b-11: yang na bya'i gshog pa la bcings nas brjod par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:480b-12: gnag dang gang du 'gro ba de dang de nyid du pha rol gyi sde rnams ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:480b-13: rang gi chung ma yang yongs su dor nas smyo bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:480b-14: bdag nyid g-yul la mchog tu gzhol bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:480b-16: rta la sogs pa rnams kyis ldog ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:480b-17: bdag nyid kyis sde yis 'gro bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:480b-18: gang gi tshe sde tshan gsum gyis g-yul byas nas dum bus /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:480b-20: pho nya gcig pus gnas pas ji lta ba bzhin du 'tsho ba tsam gyis 'tsho bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:480b-21: de'i thal bas pha rol gyi sde gshog par byed pa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:480b-22: kun tu bskor bas sgrib par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:480b-23: glo bur du glang po che'i tshad kyi rdo ba 'bebs par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:480b-25: klu'i tshul gyi sgrub pas sbyin sreg 'bum gyis 'dod pa rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:480b-26: shi ba'i pha rol tu yang dgra bo de rnams 'bangs su 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:480b-28: sum 'gyur gyis sa dang 'jig rten gsum la dbang byed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:481a-0: de nas shing se ba la'i 'bras bu 'bum phrag @481a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:481a-2: zhes pa gshin rje'i gshed dmar po'i rgyud du dngos grub phran tshegs kyi las rab 'byams kyi le'u ste bzhi pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:481a-3: de nas bcom ldan 'das mas gsol pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:481a-4: de nas bha ga la rtags yang dag par sbyor ba'i khu ba 'di nu ma rab tu 'phel bar bya ba la nad nyams pa las dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:481a-5: yid bud med kyi dbang du gyur pa med pa las dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:481a-6: de 'ching bar byed pa las kyang khu bas nu ma la bsrung ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:481a-7: bskyab pa'i sbyor ba bshad du gsol /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:481a-8: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:481a-9: khyod kyis nga la zhus pa legs so zhes gnang nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:481a-10: dang por phung po sbyang bya ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:481a-11: phyi nas rab 'byams las brtsam bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:481a-12: 'bras bu gsum gyi phye ma gzung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:481a-13: ya baksha ra b'a l'a sha //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:481a-14: zos nas bu ram 'thungs pa las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:481a-16: til mar kee ta ke'i khu ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:481a-17: hi la mo tsi khu ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:481a-18: rgyam tsha 'thungs shing byug pa de'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:481a-20: til mar kee ta ka'i khu ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:481a-21: bi tsi nri wa na yang dag ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:481a-22: drag mo bhra ma na sbyor las; ;nri wa na yis 'joms par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:481a-23: hi la mo tsi'i khu ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:481a-24: rgyam tsha cung zad yang dag ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:481a-25: grib mar rab tu 'jug byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:481a-26: pi ci bi tu 'joms par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:481b-0: @481b til mar kee ta ka'i khu ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:481b-1: rgya skyegs rtsa bar sba byas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:481b-4: pi tse nri wan yang dag ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:481b-5: klu yi phye ma 'thungs gyur na; ;bad kan rnams kyi sbrang rtsi 'joms //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:481b-6: nyi ma re re re bya ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:481b-7: phyi nas sman ni brtsam par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:481b-8: de nas 'bras bu sbyin par gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:481b-9: gzhan du 'bras bu med la dga'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:481b-10: shal mi li shun phye ma dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:481b-11: tabha snying pos bza' bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:481b-12: rnam bdun bsngags la tho rangs su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:481b-13: rung ste bza' ba za byed la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:481b-14: slar bdag ji srid 'tsho yi bar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:481b-15: khrag dang khu ba 'phel bar byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:481b-16: aom tsanda ma h'a ro sha na ai mam di bya aa mri tam me ku ru h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:481b-17: sa ti tam dang ma hi sham//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:481b-18: na ri ke la dag la yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:481b-19: w'a sh'i'i nying khu yang dag ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:481b-20: phag las byung ba'i tshil khu yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:481b-21: rtags dang rna ba nu ma'i dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:481b-22: bha ga yi yang rnam par mnyes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:481b-23: lus kun rnam par mnyes pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:481b-25: nges par sen mos bsdigs byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:481b-26: bskus nas kyang ni de nyid kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:481b-27: skye gnas dbus su rab gzhug bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:481b-29: se 'bru'i pags pa snyigs ma yi; ;yungs kar til mar la btso bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:481b-31: yungs kar dkar po shu dag dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:481b-32: dri bzang dri h'a t'i byas pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:482a-0: snyigs ma yis ni ling ga @482a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:482a-2: gzhan gyis mi thub dkar po dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:482a-3: lag ldan pi pi ling byas pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:482a-4: ma he yi yang mar sar gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:482a-6: da dhur khu ba rta bon po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:482a-7: rtsa bar bcug nas ma he yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:482a-8: mar gsar dang ni bsres pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:482a-9: da dhur 'bras bu go da ka //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:482a-10: nyin dang mtshan du gdung bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:482a-11: de nas ma he yi sam gu da mnyes nas sngar brjod pas mtshan mo gsum du byugs nas mnyes par bya ste 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:482a-12: lham bu chu shel gyi phye ma yis mar bsgrubs nas btsun mo'i skye gnas kyi nang du byug par bya'o /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:482a-13: shi thi las skye gnas dam por 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:482a-18: gla sgang rnams til gyi til mar la btso bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:482a-19: des bha ga'i yan lag mngon par bgrod dka' ba'i don du /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:482a-20: shi thil la nyam nga bar 'dor ba la sogs pa 'joms par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:482a-21: nimba'i shun pa bskol ba yis bha ga bkru bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:482a-22: ni ma'i shun pas bdug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:482a-23: gzhon nu ma bzang mo nyid dri bzang po can /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:482a-24: skal ba bzang mo la sogs pa'i yon tan dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:482a-25: kha bla'i cha shas lnga dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:482a-26: rgya skyegs kyi shing gi 'gyur byed kyi cha shas gcig dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:482b-0: chu shing gi 'gyur @482b byed kyi cha shas gcig dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:482b-1: chus btags nas byugs pa tsam gyis bha ga dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:482b-3: rtags rnams kyi spu rnams 'byi bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:482b-4: ha la ha la dang gser gyi phud bu bsres pa tsha ba'i til mar dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:482b-7: des ling ga la sogs pa la byug par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:482b-8: slar yang skra rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:482b-12: khyim bya rnams kyi mar khu dag gis mnyes pas nu ma la sogs pa rnams 'phel lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:482b-13: dzi ti'i me tog gi til mar gyis btags na bha ga 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:482b-16: shing kut rnams lte bar mnyes par bya ste nu ma 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:482b-17: rnga mo'i chus bkrus pa las ling ga 'phel bar 'gyur ba de dang 'dra'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:482b-18: dandod pa la'i rtsa ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:482b-19: ba las byung ba'i mar gyis btung bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:482b-27: sbrang dang ldan pa btung bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:482b-31: sra rtsi pog gal te sbrang rtsi dang mar gyis dril phyis las lus thams cad bzang por 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:483a-0: zla mtshan gyi dus su phag gnon pa'i rtsa ba rna ba la bcing ba las sbrum mar @483a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:483a-2: ka lamb'i p'a kam bza' bar bya ste khu ba 'phel lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:483a-3: skyu ru ra'i phye ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:483a-5: zho zos pas khu ba 'phel lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:483a-6: khu ba dang khrag zos pas khu ba 'phel lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:483a-7: bud med kyi bshad pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:483a-8: bud med kyi gci ba sbags nas btung bar bya ste khu ba 'phel lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:483a-9: skyu ru ra'i phye ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:483a-12: sbrang rtsi rnams brdod pa'i dus su bza' bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:483a-13: mig la stugs pa dang shes rab kyang skye bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:483a-14: skyu ru ra'i phye ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:483a-15: 'o ma la sogs pa bza' bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:483a-17: skyu ru ra'i khu bsrang gcig dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:483a-18: w'a gu ts'a phye ma zho gcig btung bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:483a-19: 'khogs pa la tho rangs zla ba gcig tu zos na lo lnga brgya'i tshe ru 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:483a-20: w'a gu ts'i zho gcig dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:483a-23: 'o mas kyang rung ste 'thungs na zla ba drug gis lang tsho la sogs pa dang ldan no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:483a-24: mundi ri phye ma dang mar bza' bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:483a-25: nyi ma nyi shu rtsa gcig gis lo bcu drug tu byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:483a-26: sha na'i sa bon gyi phye ma srang gcig dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:483a-27: s'a lu dmar po srang gcig dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:483a-28: ba kha dog gcig pa'i 'o ma kham phor gnyis bza' bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:483a-29: thog mar 'o ma kham phor gcig zad par 'thungs nas sa na la sogs pa de la byin nas btung bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:483b-0: 'khogs pa 'o mas btung bar @483b bya ste; nyi ma bdun nam gsum gyi bar du ji srid bar rlung dang tshad pa spang ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:483b-1: bya ba ji lta bu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:483b-2: bya ba phyi ma ji lta bus de'i skra la sogs pa ltung bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:483b-3: de nas skra dkar dang gnyer ma spangs te lo brgya phrag lngar 'tsho par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:483b-4: khrag skrod pa'i rtsa ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:483b-5: mar dang sbrang rtsi byi la'i rkang pa tsam bza' bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:483b-6: 'bras bu ni ji lta ba bzhin kho na'o; ;skyu ru ra dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:483b-11: lcags kyi phye ma rnams sbrang rtsi dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:483b-12: sha kar dag gis au dum b'a ra'i 'bras bu'i tshad kyis ril bur bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:483b-13: de nas ril bu bza' bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:483b-14: zla bas tshe lo sum cur 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:483b-15: ku m'a ri srang gcig dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:483b-17: zho dang ldan pas bza' bar bya ste stobs chen por 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:483b-19: li ga dur sum 'gyur gyi aa ru ra dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:483b-20: chu cha gcig la sogs pa zos pas stobs chen por 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:483b-21: thams cad du bdag nyid lha'i rnam par bza' bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:483b-22: sngags kyis mnyes shing byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:483b-23: khu ba rengs pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:483b-24: de nas dan da'i shing gi rtsa ba phabs kyis btags nas mgo la mnye bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:483b-25: mgo bo'i gzer 'joms par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:483b-26: sbrang dang mar dang mig sman du bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:484a-1: bu'i rtsa ba zos pa las sba ba 'joms par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:484a-2: la phug gi sa bon dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:484a-5: ru rta btags nas dril phyis byas pa las spre'u la sogs pa rnam par 'joms so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:484a-6: sha ba'i sha skam po dang ra'i 'o ma btung bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:484a-14: sbrang rtsi mnyam par bza' bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:484a-15: dus ma yin pa'i lud pa dang dbugs mi bde ba 'joms so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:484a-18: zho'i nying khus kyang rung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:484a-19: lan tshva dang lhan cig tu btung bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:484a-20: de'i khrag sri ba rnam par 'joms so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:484a-22: ya bakshar mnyam par bza' bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:484a-23: so bh'anydza na bskol ba btung bar bya ba'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:484a-24: yang na rdo 'joms pa btung bar bya ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:484a-26: tsi tra ka'i chu btung bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:484a-28: zi ra nag po dang bu ram bza' bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:484a-30: ya baksha ra'am zho btung bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:484a-32: tsha ba'i til mar la byi tang ka dang rgya mtsho byin nas cung zad bsmos [?] pa'i nyid khu btung bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:484a-34: srin bu dag rnam par 'joms so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:484b-0: aa ru ra dang bu ram bza' @484b bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:484b-1: ming ngan pa rnam par 'joms pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:484b-2: aa ru dang sga skya bza' bar bya ste rlung nad 'joms so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:484b-3: rtsva dur ba la yung bas btags nas byug par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:484b-8: ku r'a 'joms pa la sogs pa rnams 'joms so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:484b-9: bu ram dang tsha ba'i til mar btung bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:484b-10: dbugs mi bde ba rnam par 'joms so; ;aardzun dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:484b-12: mar la sogs pa rnams bza' bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:484b-14: bil ba bsregs nas bu ram bza' bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:484b-15: khrag tshad 'joms so; ;bu ram dang mar bza' bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:484b-17: bad kan dang mdze la sogs pa rnams 'joms par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:484b-18: bras bu gsum gyi phye ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:484b-19: mar dang sbrang rtsi rnams btung bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:484b-21: aa ru ra'i phye ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:484b-23: sbrang rtsi dus gsum kun tu bza' bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:484b-24: rlung dang bad kan rnam par 'joms so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:484b-25: ba sha ka'i yan lag lnga dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:484b-28: pi pi ling skam pa phye mar byas nas rgyam tshva dang sbrang rtsi yis wa di ru byas te de nas bza' bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:484b-29: dus ma yin pa'i rlung dang bad kan 'joms so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:484b-30: sh'alm'a li dkar po'i shing shun phye mar [?] byas nas padma'i sa bon dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:484b-31: ku mu ta'i 'bras bu lhan cig tu byas btags te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:485a-1: stong phrag gcig tu bzlas nas du'i ril bu'i tshad kyi ril bu rnam par byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:485a-2: grib bskams byas nas tsa na ya'i khu bas bskam par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:485a-3: tho rangs zos nas ji srid 'dod par btung bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:485a-12: seng ldeng rnams sbrang rtsis ril bur byas nas bza' bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:485a-19: m'an s'a man rnams bza' bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:485a-21: sle tres kyi khu ba dang sbrang rtsi btung bar byas te gcin nad 'joms so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:485a-23: pi pi ling gi phye ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:485a-25: sbrang rtsi rnams btung bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:485a-26: rims phra mo dang lud pa la sogs pa rnam par 'joms par byed do; ;ngo tsha can dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:485a-28: dum kha ya dag gi rtsa ba la w'a shi'i chus btags nas rab tu byug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:485a-29: sle tres kyi rtsa ba yang bza' bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:485a-32: ya bakshar yi bza' bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:485a-35: nal sham gyi lhan cig btung bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:485b-2: me li ka nag po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:485b-5: sa ha k'a ra'i sa bon dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:485b-7: tsam mo ste 'di rnams kyis bsngags par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:485b-8: de nas gu gul gyis skra la bdugs nas des mnye bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:485b-9: de nas nyi ma bdun du mes gdung bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:485b-11: rma bya'i mkhris pa dang bhring+ga r'a dza dag gi khu ba dag gis ba las byung ba'i mar la btsos nas sbyin par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:485b-14: tsha ba gsum cha mnyam par phye mar byas nas wartti ka'i dbus su 'phang bas 'og tu phyogs pa'i wartti ka'i rim pas spre'u'i til mar brgya phrag bzung nas thigs pa gnyis kyi sbyor bas gnyer ma dang skra dkar po spong ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:485b-15: 'dis mnyes te khu bas mdze la byugs pa zhi bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:485b-16: 'phral gyi mar gsar gyis mnyes nas ganta ka dang ma sa k'a dang lhan cig ra sa to la k'e dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:485b-18: tsi lo ni sa'i gong bus bum pa'i 'khrul 'khor gyi bum pa'i nang du mri shi k'a sa bkab la wa lu ka dang lhan cig me la byin pa las ro 'ching ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:485b-19: za ba las ni nyi ma'i tshogs kyi be'u'i brun bzung nas ril bur bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:485b-20: rgya spos kyi rtsa bas btags nas dkri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:485b-21: ril bu re re zos nas dug bza' ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:485b-22: dug rab tu med par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:486a-3: dbang du byed pa'i cho ga gsungs shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:486a-4: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:486a-5: gzhan gyis mi thub pa dkar po'i rtsa ba la khu bas be di k'a byas thig les bud med dbang du byed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:486a-9: sbrang rtsis btags la dril phyis byas na gang 'dod pa de dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:486a-10: dandod pa la'i rtsa ba la tambu la'i sa sbyin par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:486a-11: de bzhin du tshangs pa'i dbyug pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:486a-15: tambu la byin na dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:486a-16: gi wam dang rang byung gi me tog gi thig les skal ba dang ldan pa dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:486a-19: bhring+ga r'a dzas lhan cig skar ma rgyal la wa ni ga'i rnam par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:486a-20: thig les dbang du byed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:486a-21: bhring+ga r'a dza'i rtsa ba la bdag nyid kyi khu bas mig sman bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:486a-22: de bzhin du rma bya'i gtsug phud dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:486a-24: khva ta'i lce skam po'i phye ma gang gi mgo la byin pa de dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:486a-25: ba lang gi so la bza' ba dang btung ba btags nas byin na dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:486a-26: khyab 'jug gnon pa'i rtsa ba btags la byugs na dga' ba las de bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:486b-0: skar ma rgyal la da dhu ra'i rtsa ba bzung @486b nas skar ma skag la wa da'i shing shun no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:486b-2: nag pa la me tog go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:486b-4: cha mnyam pa'i phye ma la sbrang rtsis pa di ka ru bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:486b-5: ras la btums nas bskam par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:486b-6: tambu la la byin nas dung gi phye mas dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:486b-10: rkang pa'i mthe bos gang gi ming bris te che ge mo shog cig cas brjod pas 'ong bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:486b-11: du ba med pa'i me la gdung bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:486b-12: skar ma rgyal la gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rtsa ba'i rtsa la bton te ma'i zhun gyi mar khus de la bskus na thod pa ru dud pa btung bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:486b-13: mig sman nges bud med dang skyes pa dbang du byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:486b-16: seng ldeng ru rta byin na mi 'dod pa 'joms par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:486b-20: n'ag ge sar gyis mig la mig sman du byas na dbang byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:486b-24: sa ha de rnams kyis byas pa'i til mar gyis dbang du byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:486b-25: na ma shtsanda l'i che ge mo me wa shra m'a na ya sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:486b-26: stong phrag bcu bzlas pas sngon du bsnyen pa byas nas bsnyen pa khri'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:486b-27: dur khrod kyi thal ba la bcu bzhi la brgya rtsa brgyad du mngon par bsngags te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:486b-28: bud med kyi mgo la byin na dbang du 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:487a-0: rtag tu nges par sems pas slar yang dga' bzhin pa'i sems dang @487a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:487a-2: shing khu byug gi mig dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:487a-5: gzhan yang byang gi mukta shi kha rkeng pa la bcings nas khu ba rengs bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:487a-8: gzhan yang shar dkar po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:487a-9: pu kha'i rtsa bas kyang 'khrig pa las khu ba rengs par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:487a-10: 'jam 'bras la sbubs byas nas dngul chus bkang ste srad bus rked pa la bcings na khu ba 'dzin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:487a-14: aarka dkar po'i shing bal gyi snying pos sbar na khu ba rengs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:487a-15: sa'i 'khril shing gi phye ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:487a-16: dbus kyi snying po til mar gyis bsreg par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:487a-19: sa'i 'khril shing phye mar byas nas sam me tog gi mar khu btung bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:487a-20: des rkang pa'i mthil la bskus na khu ba rengs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:487a-23: padma dkar po'i ge sar dang sbrang rtsi rnams kyis lta bar byugs na khu ba rengs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:487a-24: padma'i 'dab mas khyab 'jug gnon pa'i rtsa bar 'dab mas dkris nas w'a d'i dkre bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:487a-26: ba bla'i khu ba'i mig sman dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:487b-0: phug ron gyi brun rnams kyis ling ga la dril @487b phyes byas pa las khu ba rengs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:487b-3: barbha dang shri ga byugs na steng du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:487b-4: shing ka bed kyi rtsa ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:487b-6: ra'i gcin gyis btags nas ling ga la kun byugs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:487b-8: lan gsum du steng du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:487b-9: tsha ba'i chus bkrus na rab tu zhi bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:487b-10: 'gron bu'i nang du dngul chus bkang nas kha ru bzhag na khu ba rengs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:487b-11: ra'i gcin gyis dbang po chu lha mo la nyi ma bdun du bgo bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:487b-12: des dril phyis byas pa las ling ga rengs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:487b-13: da dhu ra'i rtsa ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:487b-14: k'ama rtsa'i rtsa'i rtsa ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:487b-15: ao sha na'i rtsa ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:487b-16: ga bur gyi khu bas btags nas ling ga la byugs na 'dod pa'i bud med 'dzag par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:487b-20: gho sha'i phye ma sbrang rtsis btags nas ling ga la byugs na'ang de bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:487b-21: phug ron gyi brun sbrang rtsis btags nas ling ga la bskus na 'dod pa'i bud med 'dzag par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:487b-22: ka m'a ts'i'i rtsa ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:487b-23: tambu la shin tu dga' ba'i dus su bud med kyis zos na de 'dzag par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:487b-26: ma lle k'a rgyam tsha bsres par byas nas rang gi sdigs mdzub kyi sor mor bcug ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:487b-27: de'i bha gar bcug nas rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma'i rtsa ji srid du de 'dzag par byed kyi bar du bskyod par bye'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:488a-4: sbrang rtsi rnams kyis byugs na bud med 'dzag par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:488a-5: shing rdza ya sti'i rtsa bas btags nas 'bras thug po che dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:488a-6: chu bsres pa'i zla mtshan gyi dbus su de'i skye gnas la rab tu byugs na bud med mo sham du 'gyur bar the tshom med do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:488a-7: p'a la sha'i sa bon btags nas byug par bya zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:488a-8: mar dang sbrang rtsi 'thungs pa las khrag gi mtshan ma'i bud med mo sham du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:488a-10: phye ma leb kyi phye ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:488a-11: phyis sa skye gnas su byin na dam por 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:488a-12: khu ba rengs pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:488a-13: mgrin pa bteg nas dam 'khyud cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:488a-14: lha la yang yang 'o byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:488a-15: rgyal po'i dngos por byas pa cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:488a-17: gang zhig nye bar ma zhugs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:488a-18: gnas shig tu ni rgyal srid 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:488a-19: dgra bo g-yo med 'gyur ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:488a-22: mnga' bdag de bzhin der bzlas pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:488a-23: sems can don du bdag la shod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:488a-24: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:488a-25: phris sku dang ni gzugs brnyan la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:488a-26: nyer spyod lnga rnams kyis mchod nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:488a-27: drug cu rtsa bzhi yongs rdzogs pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:488b-0: gtor ma thun mtshams @488b gsum du byin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:488b-1: gser bum de bzhin kham phor brgyad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:488b-3: de bzhin bsngags la mchog gzhol ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:488b-4: slar yang shing rta kham phor sogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:488b-5: mar dang sprang rtsis bkang ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:488b-6: gtso bo dpal gyi khyim steng du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:488b-7: aa: yig 'khor lor nges bcing bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:488b-8: gsang sngags rig pa hr'i:shtr'i sogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:488b-9: blo dang ldan pas dus gsum mchod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:488b-10: ga da ka yi steng gi char //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:488b-11: dkyil 'khor lnga po byas nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:488b-12: legs par dkri ba byin nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:488b-13: 'bad pas sa kun sbyang bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:488b-14: sa gzhi yongs su bzung byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:488b-15: dkyil 'khor mchog ni bya ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:488b-16: rdul tshon mdzes pas bri ba'am //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:488b-17: yang na 'bras ni thug po che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:488b-18: kha dog lnga po de bzhin ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:488b-19: de bzhin slob dpon lnga rnams kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:488b-20: cung zad myos byed 'thungs nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:488b-21: steng gi ri mo'i steng du ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:488b-23: grva bzhi ru ni thod pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:488b-25: srad bus thig gdab shes rab can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:488b-26: lha mo'i dkyil 'khor ches mang ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:488b-27: rnam pa ji bzhin mngon bri bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:488b-28: 'dab bzhir de bzhin bri bya ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:488b-29: khyad par dbyug pa dkar po'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:488b-30: dbus su dbyug pa dkar po ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:488b-31: sna tshogs rdo rje bzhin bri bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:488b-32: rigs ni lnga po mtshungs par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:488b-33: skal ba byas nas legs par bslab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:488b-34: rgyud la sogs pa'i sbyor bas 'dir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:489a-2: slob dpon gsang ba shes rab dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:489a-3: bzhi pa de slar de bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:489a-4: slob dpon bzhi po rnams nyid kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:489a-5: yang dang yang du gtor ma sbyin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:489a-6: dril bu rdo rje mnyam par gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:489a-7: sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:489a-8: kun tu ser po'i gos nyid dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:489a-9: mi yi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:489a-10: gser dngul zangs lcags bzhi yis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:489a-11: bum pa dkyil 'khor yang dag dgod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:489a-12: dbus su gser gyi bum pa yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:489a-13: sna tshogs rin chen legs par mdzes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:489a-14: gser dngul zangs lcags las byung ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:489a-17: me tog dmar pos legs mdzes pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:489a-18: slar yang phyir gzhan dkyil 'khor bzhir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:489a-19: sdong po bkod sogs 'bad pas bklag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:489a-20: phyi ru zan la 'dus pa nyal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:489a-21: longs spyod de bzhin gzhan la bdun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:489a-22: dge 'dun yon dang longs spyod kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:489a-23: blo bzang 'bad pas bya ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:489a-24: shar bu wa da lho ru ne //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:489a-25: aa shva ta nub wa ku la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:489a-26: byang du na ga ge sar ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:489a-27: shar du me tog dkar lhor ser //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:489a-28: de bzhin nub dmar byang du yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:489a-29: ljang gu de bzhin steng du yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:489a-30: ma ru la da rje [?] rigs dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:489a-31: bram ze rdo rje rin chen sogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:489a-32: shar gyi phyogs su rab sbyin phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:489a-33: skye bo 'di dag sa ga la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:489a-34: sna tshogs rgyan kun gyis brgyan pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:489b-0: @489b ma bdag gi ni ngos bzhi ru //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:489b-2: lhan cig mchod sbyin 'dus pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:489b-3: brgya rtsa brgyad rab sbyin byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:489b-4: pus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:489b-5: sar btsugs lag pa sbyar byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:489b-6: rin chen la sogs kyis spras pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:489b-7: sna tshogs la sogs rgyan dang gser //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:489b-8: gang ba'i snod la de brjod pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:489b-9: sa steng thams cad gnod med pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:489b-10: lha yi rgyal srid bdag la stsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:489b-11: 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:489b-12: dbang po nyid kyang bdag la gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:489b-13: de nas dpal ldan gshin rje'i gshed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:489b-14: dmar po'i slob dpon bden pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:489b-15: rgyal po chen po 'di dag ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:489b-16: yid kyi shing rta rdzogs par gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:489b-17: gshin rje gshed kyi rnal 'byor pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:489b-18: sngags dang bsam gtan mchog gzhol ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:489b-19: blo ldan gus pas cung zad nyon //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:489b-20: shes rab pha rol phyin pa bslab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:489b-21: dzambha la la chu sbyin dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:489b-22: yi dvags gtor ma de bzhin ston //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:489b-23: brtse ba'i ngang tshul 'jig rten skyong //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:489b-24: deng khyod la sogs brjod par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:489b-25: mi bdag bdag la bden par smros //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:489b-26: mnga' bdag bden las gzhan min pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:489b-27: mi bdag gis bden brjod par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:489b-28: mgo dang snying gar rdo rje ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:489b-29: lan gsum byin nas rgyal srid bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:489b-31: gnas su bdag la smra ba ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:489b-32: deng bdag skye ba 'bras bur bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:489b-33: mi yi 'gro ba legs par thob //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:490a-2: dmar po'i rnal 'byor pa bdag ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:490a-3: 'jig rten gsum rgyal srid byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:490a-4: phyis nas dbang po la sogs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:490a-5: bzlog pa bdag gis byed pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:490a-6: de bzhin slar yang kee l'a shar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:490a-7: bud med rgyal srid byas nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:490a-8: rgyal srid 'byor grub chen mang ngang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:490a-9: mtha' dag rgyal srid khur bzung nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:490a-10: mi bdag 'phrog byed zla ba ltar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:490a-11: sangs rgyas kun dang dngos grub kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:490a-13: da ltar lha yi de mdzod la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:490a-14: mnga' bdag bdag la mchog stsol cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:490a-15: de bzhin kho nar bden dang bden //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:490a-16: sa yi gnas su phyag byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:490a-17: bzod par gsol nas khyim 'gro bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:490a-18: de bzhin sna tshogs glu dang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:490a-19: rol mo la sogs pa rnams kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:490a-20: spro bar bcas pas sbyin sreg bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:490a-21: nyi ma so sor nyer sbyong bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:490a-22: mtshan mo phyed nas tshogs 'khor dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:490a-23: shes rab bcas shing yon dang bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:490a-24: rim 'dis nyi ma nyi shu ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:490a-25: zla ba drug gis mchod sbyin rdzogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:490a-26: de bzhin kun du 'ongs nas gar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:490a-27: glang po rta la sogs pa'i yon //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:490a-28: byin nas mchog ni blang bar byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:490a-29: de tshe yang dang yang du ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:490a-30: gang gang mi bdag gang yin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:490a-31: gzhan du pho nyar rab tu 'jog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:490a-32: rgyal srid bdag gis bzung ba nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:490a-33: gal te min na chad pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:490b-0: rab tu bzhag @490b nas 'byin par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:490b-1: sna tshogs rin chen la sogs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:490b-3: rang phan rang gi skal ba rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:490b-4: rab mchog gal te 'dod na ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:490b-5: de yis rgyal srid sbyin par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:490b-6: gang gang ming gis mi 'ong na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:490b-8: me la gdung bar bya ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:490b-9: skad cig de las de rmongs te //
