K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:499a-19: bshad pa'i rgyud kyi rjes 'brangs nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:499a-20: rnal 'byor pa khyod gshin rje'i gshed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:499a-21: dmar po'i rgyud chen tshig nyung de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:499a-22: gang gis yongs su ngal med par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:499a-23: bde ba chen po gsungs pa de'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:499a-24: bde ba thams cad kun bsdus pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:499a-25: pad 'dab drug cu rtsa bzhi pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:499a-26: rgyu bcas ched du rnal 'byor ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:499a-27: longs spyod rdzogs las bde ba thob //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:499a-28: spyod cing spyod la de rtse'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:499a-29: skad cig gcig mngon rdzogs byang chub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:499a-30: gzhan du 'jig rten gsum spyod byed; ;'di ni sku ni bzhi po ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:499a-31: sangs rgyas rnams kyi'ang spyod yul min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:499a-33: rnal 'byor dam pa'i rnam pas bstan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:499b-0: 'khor lo bzhi yi rnam @499b pa yis; ;kye yi rdo rjer bdag gis bstan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:499b-1: sgom pa'i sbyor pa 'dus pa ru //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:499b-2: rtsa rnams mkha' 'gro ma kun gyis /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:499b-3: 'bras bu'i sgrub thabs kye rdo rjer //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:499b-4: gang du rlung gi sgrub thabs ni; ;nyin dang mtshan ma'i rab dbye la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:499b-5: 'dab ma drug cu bzhir dbyug gu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:499b-6: zhes pa 'di dag thun mong gi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:499b-7: rab tu dbye bas brjod par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:499b-8: lha yi gzugs kyi bdag nyid can; ;slar yang sku gsung thugs dbye bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:499b-9: yig gsum nyid kyi mnyam gzhag pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:499b-10: yid kyis khong du chud par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:499b-11: aom yig gis ni 'jug pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:499b-12: a'a:yig gis ni de bzhin gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:499b-13: h'um yig gis ni dbyung ba yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:499b-15: aom a'a: h'um zhes bya ba 'dis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:499b-16: rgyu bcas rgyu med bstan par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:499b-17: de las sa bon mtshan ma'ang slar; ;sna rtser mchog tu bsam par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:499b-18: 'od gsal ba yi rang bzhin bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:499b-19: de bzhin bdag gzhan mnyam pa nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:499b-20: byed med gzugs kyi phreng ba yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:499b-21: yang yang skad cig skad cig ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:499b-22: gcig las slar yang bzhengs ched du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:499b-23: sngags pas grib ma sgyu ma lta'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:499b-24: dbye bas kun tu bsam par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:499b-25: dag pa'i sku 'di yis ni gang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:499b-26: ye shes brtson pas bsgom par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:499b-27: sems can kun ni chos nyid byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:499b-29: bla ma'i man ngag las rtogs bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:499b-30: slar yang sngags pas 'jig rten don //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:500a-0: slar yang yi ge bsgom par @500a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:500a-1: bya; ;longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sar lan grangs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:500a-2: kun tu nges pa 'ching bas bcing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:500a-3: lag pas nges sbyar steng gis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:500a-5: rkyang ma dang ni ro ma yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:500a-6: dbus su g-yo med 'jug par gyis /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:500a-7: sku gsung thugs su nges sbyar nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:500a-8: phyag rgya mchog tu bsam par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:500a-9: skad cig de las lhan skyes 'char //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:500a-10: bsgom bya 'dir ni the tshom med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:500a-11: don 'di gang gis shes byed pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:500a-12: blo bzang yid ni mnyam par bzhag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:500a-13: chos rnams thams cad de shes byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:500a-14: sangs rgyas lam gyi man ngag go //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:500a-15: 'jug ngogs chen por khyod bkrus te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:500a-16: de bzhin gshegs pas mngon dbang bskur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:500a-17: de yang gang dang gang 'gro ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:500a-18: der ni sangs rgyas 'ong bar byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:500a-19: kun tu byang chub sems dpa' nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:500a-20: sna tshogs sems can phan par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:500a-21: ha har dgod par gyis shig ces //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:500a-22: phyogs bcur rnam par gnas ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:500a-23: bdud rnams kun tu 'bros par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:500a-24: thal me sbyar bar byas nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:500a-25: khyed zhabs kun gyis 'dud par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:500a-26: sna tshogs gzugs 'chang bud med ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:500a-28: btsogs ma til mchog ma la sogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:500a-29: bkug nas rdzogs par longs spyod byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:500b-0: ces pas gshin rje'i gshed dmar po'i @500b rgyud du rlung gi de nyid de le'u bcu bzhi pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:500b-1: de nas rlung gi rnam grangs ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:500b-2: bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan du gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:500b-3: rab tu phye nas bshad kyi nyon /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:500b-4: rigs kyi dbyug gu so gnyis la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:500b-5: thun tshod bzhi ru 'gyur ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:500b-6: bcu drug pa gnyis kyis rnam par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:500b-7: thun gcig dbyug gu lhag pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:500b-8: thun phyed dbyug gu bzhi yin te; ;des ni rim pa bzhin 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:500b-9: nyin dang mtshan mor rim pas kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:500b-10: 'pho ba bcu drug rab tu brjod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:500b-11: me dang rlung dang chu dang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:500b-12: dbang chen dkyil 'khor bzhi po ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:500b-13: 'bab pas dbyug gu bzhi rab grags /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:500b-14: rlung na bzhi po rnam 'phel las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:500b-15: 'khor lo bzhi ru rab tu brjod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:500b-16: rnam pa sna tshogs la sogs bzhi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:500b-17: skad cig thang cig sogs dbye las; ;rnam pa bzhi ru de brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:500b-18: de bzhin dga' ba bzhi po ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:500b-19: thun tshod bzhir yang rab tu brjod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:500b-20: sku gsum de la sku bzhi pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:500b-21: de bzhin thams cad bzhi ru yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:500b-22: phyi yi rim pa de bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:500b-23: rnal 'byor bzhi dang bzhi pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:500b-24: sku ni bzhi ru yang dag brjod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:500b-26: rab tu dbye bas drug cu bzhi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:500b-27: kye yi rdo rje bstan par 'dir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:500b-28: de bzhin nges bstan lus kyi ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:500b-30: de yang sku ni bzhi pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:500b-31: dga' ba bzhi la mtshon pa yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:500b-32: sku bzhi por ni rab tu brjod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:501a-0: @501a *// dpal gshin rje'i gshed dmar po'i rgyud mdor bstan pa ste le'u bco lnga pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:501a-1: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:501a-2: srid pa'i 'khor lor brjod bya ci //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:501a-3: lha yi gsang las ches gsang bris //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:501a-4: srid gsum sems can rmongs pa rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:501a-5: nyams byed snying po 'di nyon cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:501a-6: rtag tu sangs rgyas nyid sgrub pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:501a-7: bdud kyis sprul pa 'dis ni zhes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:501a-10: 'khor ba mchog tu brtse bar byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:501a-12: skyon gyis ci yang gos pa med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:501a-14: bcu gnyis don zhes rab tu gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:501a-16: yan lag bcu gnyis rab tu grags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:501a-18: sangs rgyas kun gyis rab grags pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:501a-19: chos rnams ma lus shes byed cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:501a-20: chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:501a-21: de phyir yan lag bcu gnyis pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:501a-22: chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:501a-23: bdag gis bshad par bya yi nyon //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:501a-24: ma rig pa dang 'du byed dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:501a-26: ming dang gzugs dang skye mched drug dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:501a-33: rga shi zhes bya ba yan lag bcu gnyis rnams so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:501b-4: sngon gyi so sor kun tu rtog pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:501b-10: rkang lag 'gyus pa'i gnas skabs lnga'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:501b-12: mngal nas nges par byung ba'i mig la sogs pa'i dbang po drug rdzogs pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:501b-15: rnam par shes pa gsum 'dus pa las so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:501b-19: btang snyoms kyi mtshan nyid las don rnam pa gsum du dbye'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:501b-20: sred pa ni; 'khrig pa'i 'dod chags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:501b-24: 'byung 'gyur gyi srid pa las kyi 'bras bu'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:501b-26: slar yang phung po la nying mtshams sbyor ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:501b-28: ming dang gzugs la sogs pa'i yan lag bzhi'o zhes so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:501b-29: yan lag bcu gnyis khyad par las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:501b-30: thub pas rten cing kun 'byung bstan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:501b-31: ji srid nyon mongs las dang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:501b-32: sdug bsngal gsum du de rnams 'dus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:501b-33: dang po brgyad pa dgu nyon mongs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:501b-34: gnyis pa bcu pa las su 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:501b-35: lhag ma bdun ni sdug bsngal yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:501b-36: bcu gnyis po ni gsum 'dus phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:501b-37: chos gsum po ni bstan par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:501b-38: zlas dbye gnyis su de 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:502a-2: de nyid yang yang de 'khor zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:502a-6: de ltar stong las chos rab 'byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:502a-7: chos las 'pha pa'ang yod man te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:502a-8: legs par klog dang mar me rgya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:502a-9: me long sgra dang nyi ma 'pho //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:502a-10: sa bon las ni phung po 'di //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:502a-11: mtshams sbyor ba dang 'pho ba med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:502a-13: 'dir brjod yan lag bcu gnyis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:502a-14: khyad par thub pas bstan pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:502a-15: ji ltar rten cing yang dag 'byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:502a-16: de rnams bsdus par shes par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:502a-17: so sor nges bstan nyan par 'dod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:502a-18: de de sangs rgyas spyod yul zhes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:502a-20: nyon mongs las dang sdug bsngal rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:502a-21: zhes pas ji srid bsdus pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:502a-22: de la gnyis dag gis lhag pa'i bcu so sor bstan pa la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:502a-23: yan lag ces pa 'di dag gi cha shas kyi khyad par ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:502a-25: aam ga pam ga'i dngos po'i khyad par ni bsngags pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:502a-29: lus dang ngag dang yid 'khrig pa las thub pa des ni thub pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:502a-31: rab tu gsal bar gsungs pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:502a-33: de rnams kyi gtso bo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:502b-0: dbang @502b phyug tu nges pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:502b-2: ngo bo nyid la sogs pa ma yin gyi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:502b-3: yan lag bcu gnyis kyi khyad par ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:502b-4: de lta mod kyi nyon mongs pa rnams la las dang sdug bsngal rnams su ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:502b-5: phan tshun bstan pa dbyug gu gsum gyi tshul gyis gsum rnams su ji lta ba bzhin du bsdus nas 'gro ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:502b-7: slar yang nyon mongs pa rnams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:502b-10: de rnams ji lta ba bzhin du 'di gsum bsdus nas ji ltar 'gro zhe na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:502b-12: dang po brgyad dgu nyon mongs 'gyur; ;zhes pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:502b-13: yan lag bcu gnyis po 'di rnams kyi khyad par gyi dang rnam dang ba ma rig pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:502b-15: dgu pa nye bar len pa zhes pa gsum po 'di rnams nyon mongs pa so sor bsdus par rtogs par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:502b-16: gnyis pa bcu pa las yin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:502b-21: 'di dag las su bsdus par rig par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:502b-22: lhag ma bdun ni sdug bsngal yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:502b-24: las su bsdus pa 'da rnams kyi lhag ma gang yin pa'i yan lag gi khyad par bdun ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:502b-25: sdug bsngal du bsdus par rig par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:503a-2: yang gi sgra rab tu sbyor ba ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:503a-3: bsdu ba yang dag par rab tu sbyor ba ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:503a-4: ma rig pa la sogs pa rnams sdug bsngal du yang dag par sdud par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:503a-5: de bzhin chos bcu gnyis po 'di rnams thams cad ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:503a-8: sdug bsngal zhes bya ba gsum du bsdus te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:503a-9: dman pa dang lhag pa yod pa ma yin par shes par byed pa'i don las so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:503a-11: 'di rnams mdo ru nges par bstan pa de srid du yongs su bgrangs pa 'di dag mchog tu yod do zhes brjod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:503a-12: ci ste gang las 'di rnams las dang nyon mongs rnams kyis dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:503a-13: las dang sdug bsngal rnams kyis 'gyur zhe na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:503a-15: gsum rnams zlas dbyer 'gyur ba ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:503a-17: bdun pa nyon mongs pa zhes bya ba ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:503a-18: gsum rnams su zlas dbye bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:503a-19: las zhes bya ba zlas dbyer 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:503a-20: zlas dbye ba las rab tu 'gyur ba 'khor na'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:503a-21: sdug bsngal zhes pa sngar bzhin du nges par bstan pa las bdun pa gsum 'byung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:503a-22: sdug bsngal zhes bya ba rnams su nyon mongs pa zhes bya ba gnyis po de nyid ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:503a-23: rab tu 'khor bar byed pas srid pa'i 'khor lo'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:503b-0: las kyi gzugs @503b kyis sgra gcan no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:503b-1: de yang ming gsum pa can 'dir 'khor lo byung ba las 'jig rten bdun po der yongs su 'khor bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:503b-5: zla ba shar du yongs su 'khor bar byed pa bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:503b-7: de bzhin du rdzogs par 'byung ba ni ma yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:503b-8: de lta mod kyi nges pa ni med do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:503b-10: de nas da ni lus can thams cad dbang phyug byed pa po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:503b-11: byed pa ci yin zhe na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:503b-13: 'gro ba thams cad phan tshun du rgyu dang 'bras bu yang 'ga' zhig kyang 'dir med de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:503b-14: sems can la gzhan du nye bar btags pa las so /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:503b-15: rgyu'i yang 'di yongs su byed pa la rgyur nye bar btags pa tsam mo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:503b-16: de'i phyir rdzas gzhan la sems can du bden no zhes so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:503b-17: de nas da ni gnas pa'i 'jig rten las pha rol gyi 'jig rten du rjes su 'gro ba ci zhe na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:503b-19: 'jig rten pha rol gyi don tsam yang dngos po ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:503b-21: 'on kyang stong pa kho na yis stong pa'i chos rnams rab tu 'byung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:503b-24: bdag gi ba med pa'i nyon mongs dang las kyi ming can lnga po rnams las bdag dang dag gi bas stong pa'i 'bras bu'i ming can bdun po'i chos rnams rab tu 'byung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:504a-0: 'pho ba yang med do zhes pa de lta bur 'dzin pa'i rang bzhin du bdag tu gnas pa rnams las @504a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:504a-1: rang bzhin dang bral ba'i stong pa'i chos bdun po rnams rab tu 'byung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:504a-3: de'ang 'di dag bstan pa ci zhe na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:504a-5: legs par klog dang sgron me rgya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:504a-6: me long sgra dang nyi ma 'pho //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:504a-7: sa bon mig gis ngas bstan pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:504a-9: de kho na nyid las 'gro ba med pa nyid dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:504a-10: rang bzhin gyis bdag kyang med de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:504a-11: tha snyad du 'jig rten pha rol yod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:504a-14: bla ma las klog par byed pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:504a-16: de'i dngos po bla ma las klog pa nyams pa med la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:504a-17: slob mas klog pa yang nyams pa med cing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:504a-18: slob mas klog pa gzhan ma yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:504a-19: de bzhin du kun tu 'byung bar byed na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:504a-20: rgyu med pa can gyi nyes par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:504a-21: de bzhin du 'chi bar byed pa'i sems ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:504a-22: 'jig rten pha rol tu 'gro ba med de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:504a-23: rtag pa'i nyes par thal ba'i phyir ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:504a-24: 'jig rten pha rol gzhan kho na las 'byung ba ma yin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:504a-26: bla ma las klog par byed pa'i rgyu mtshan can ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:504a-27: slob ma'i klog par byed pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:504a-28: de nyid de las gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin du de'o zhes nus pa mngon par brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:504b-0: de bzhin du de 'chi ba'i mthar thug pa'i sems la bsten nas skye ba'i cha shas can gyi sems de nyid @504b gzhan ma yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:504b-1: de bzhin de yang nus pa mngon par brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:504b-5: bzhin las me long lnga las gzugs brnyan no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:504b-7: nyi ma dang nor bu'i 'od dang bud shing rnams las me'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:504b-9: dper na shu ga'i 'bras bu zos pa'i rgyu mtshan gyis gzhan gyis kha 'dzag pa las gzhan ma yin no zhes rab tu shes par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:504b-10: de bzhin du phung po las phyir phung po 'pho ba med pa yang mkhas pa rnams kyis kun tu dpyad pa'o zhes so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:504b-16: rnam par shes pa'i ming can 'di rnams kyi phung po nyid mtshams sbyor ba 'di dag phung po lnga po rnams su nges par brtag par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:504b-17: rgyu med pa can yang ma yin la gzhan las 'byung ba yang ma yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:504b-18: 'jig rten 'di las 'jig rten 'dod pa yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:504b-19: de nas mig kyang dngos po 'pho ba med do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:504b-20: 'di de srid du 'du byed 'khor ba'i rim pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:504b-23: de'i phyir phyin ci log tu rtogs pa 'di bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:504b-24: gang gi phyir rtag tu sdug bsngal stong pa'i bdag nyid can gyi dngos po yin pa de'i phyir so sor kun tu rtog pa'i dngos po la kun tu rmongs par mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:504b-25: rmongs pa med pa'i yid rtag tu skye bar mi byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:505a-1: med pas nyes par mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:505a-2: gdug pa med pas rtag tu sdig pa'i las su mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:505a-3: las su gyur pa'i dngos po nye bar mi len no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:505a-4: nye bar len pa med pa dang mngon par 'du byad pa med do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:505a-5: dngos po dang dngos po med pa gdags pa med do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:505a-6: ma skyes pa'i phung po la yid rnams sdug bsngal rnams su mi 'gyur ro; ;de bzhin du 'dir rnam pa lnga po 'di'i rgyu'i zas byin pa las 'dir 'bras bu rnam pa bdun thob kyi gzhan med pa las mi 'byung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:505a-7: de yang thar pa zhes brjod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:505a-8: de bzhin du dad pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:505a-11: 'pho ba la sogs pa rnams rtag tu lta ba ngan pa dang gya nom pa rnams mi 'byung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:505a-12: bcom ldan 'das kyis yang 'dir tshigs su bcad pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:505a-13: rkyen las 'byung ba ma mthong zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:505a-14: don nyid kyis ni tshor ba med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:505a-15: skye ba dang ni 'jig pa yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:505a-16: gang gis 'byung bar rnam par brtags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:505a-17: 'di la bsal bya ci yang med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:505a-18: gzhag par bya ba cung zad med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:505a-19: yang dag nyid la yang dag lta //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:505a-20: yang dag mthong na rnam par grol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:505a-21: rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:505a-22: kha sbyor gyi tshul gyis kyang gnas pa la 'dzam bu'i gling pa'i 'jig rten gyi 'dzag pa'i bde ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:505b-0: de rnams tshe brgya pa lo brgya'i che rnams @505b so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:505b-1: bcom ldan 'das bud med med pa las ji ltar khu ba rengs par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:505b-2: khu ba rengs pa dang bral bas tshe ring po rjes su 'gro ba med do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:505b-3: de'i phyir 'og nas steng du rlung gi rgyu ba rjes su bcing bar byed pa las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:505b-4: srog brtan par byas pa la lus la rgas pa dang 'chi ba mi 'byung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:505b-5: dang por lus dag par gyur nas chos kyi phyag rgya rab tu bsgrub par bya'o; ;phyi'i dga' ba gang dang 'dra ba de dang 'dra ba bsgom par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:505b-6: de bzhin du slar yang rnal 'byor pas lus kyi phyag rgya'i dga' ba rtsom pa la rkang pa g-yon pas tshangs pa'i skud pa kun tu bcir nas kha steng du byas nas h'a yig rnam par bsam par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:505b-7: slar yang s'ita yig byas nas h'um yig snying gar gnas pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:505b-8: a'a: yig slar yang bsgom par bya'o; ;'dab ma brgyad pa ge sar dang bcas pa de'i dbus su hr'i: yig 'bar ba de la 'od zer dang bcas pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:505b-9: de las nges par byung ba'i ri mo dkar po nges par 'byung ba slar yang 'ongs te padma 'dab ma drug cu rtsa bzhi pa'i dbus su son par bsam par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:505b-10: slar yang aa yig bsam par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:505b-11: rnal 'byor pas srog gi rlung slar yang bcang bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:505b-12: de'i phyogs su lha mor gsal ba'i tshangs pa'i mdud pa nges par byung nas bha ga dang snying gar yang ldan par bsam par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:506a-0: padma 'dab ma brgyad pa de la phyogs su dma @506a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:506a-2: me'i zur du me dang de bzhin du slar yang rlung du'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:506a-3: dbang ldan du sngon po yang ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:506a-4: de bzhin du srin po'i zur du'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:506a-5: de'i dbus su son pa'i h'um yig kha dog nag po 'od zer dmar po can no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:506a-6: de las nges par byung ba'i ri mo spyi bor son pa rnam par bsam par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:506a-7: 'og dang steng du h'um yig kha dog nag po 'od zer dang bcas pa der son pa bsam par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:506a-8: ri mo 'bar bar byed pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:506a-9: yang nas yang du de bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:506a-10: de'i tshe khyogs bya ba'i sgom pa bla ma'i man ngag las so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:506a-11: de'i tshe gtum mo 'bar bas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bsregs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:506a-12: ri bong can 'dzag pa 'og gi bha ga la dga' ba chen po'i bde bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:506a-13: slar yang gnyis gnyis steng du 'gro ba'i don du srog dang thur sel 'gog pa las sems stong pa la nges par sbyar nas myos par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:506a-14: slar yang sems myos par gyur pa ji srid du 'khyil ba bcings pa'i sbyor ba las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:506a-15: de'i tshe 'khor ba las 'bad pas kun nas g-yas su 'khor ba med par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:506a-16: slar yang kho da'i sgra nye bar gnas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:506b-0: chos kyi 'khor lo la h'um yig gi n'a da sa slar yang gnas su rab tu bkug nas longs spyod rdzogs pa'i 'khor lo la rtsa gnyis rab tu g-yo bar byas nas slar yang @506b brtan par bcing bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:506b-1: g-yon pa gnyis po de la zhu bar gyur par de'i tshe 'ong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:506b-2: de la yang dag par sbyangs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:506b-3: slar yang ye shes kyi 'khor lo la srub par byed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:506b-5: bla ma'i man ngag las so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:506b-6: slar yang 'khor lo gsum po myos par byed pa'i sbyor bas sbyang bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:506b-7: steng du song ba de la bde ba chen po brtan par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:506b-8: 'di rnams lam gyi mchog ste phul du byung ba'i lha rnams kyi spyod yul ma yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:506b-9: gang zhig shes pa bsod nams dang ldan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:506b-10: 'jig rten gsum dang bcas pas mchod par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:506b-11: lo gcig tu goms pas ches phra ba'i lus su 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:506b-12: sgra chen po'i rang bzhin rab tu smra'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:506b-13: de bzhin du sems phra ba'i rang bzhin dang 'dod pa'i don la kun tu rgyu ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:506b-14: gdul bya'i ched du rgya mtsho dang nam mkha' la yang 'gro'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:506b-16: blo bzang rtse bar byed cing dga' bar byed do zhes gshin rje'i gshed dmar po'i rgyud du goms pa'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:506b-19: ltad mo la sogs pa mnga' bdag gsung du gsol; sbyor ba sna tshogs ma lus nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:506b-20: de bzhin dus kyi mtshan nyid dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:506b-22: da lta bka' drin mdzad du gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:507a-2: lha mo legs so legs par byas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:507a-3: khyod kyis gang gzhan byas te bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:507a-4: aom dzv'a la ka r'a la pa da ne sarb'a satva h'a la h'a la badzre su badzre sph'a ra sph'a ra ya sph'a ra ya sarba me gha b'a ta /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:507a-5: brishti stvambha ya spho ta ya spho ta ya gha: gha: gha: sarba p'a n'i yam sho sha ya h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:507a-6: gsang sngags 'di dag bzlas par bya zhing khro bo'i lta stangs kyis nam mkha' la blta bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:507a-7: rlung dang sprin la sogs pa 'joms par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:507a-8: aom phat k'a ra phem ha ha h'a h'a phat aom hr'i: sht'i bi kram t'a na na sa rba kro dh'a na k'i la ya k'i la ya badzra dande na a'a ko ta ya a'a ko ta ya h'um h'um phat phat sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:507a-9: hr'i: brjod nas lha'i bdag nyid kyi rdul rnam pa bdun sbyin par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:507a-11: aom ya m'anta ka hr'i:shtv'i h'um h'um phat phat tr'a sa ya tr'a sa ya tsanda tsanda pra tsanda pra tsanda h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:507a-12: ces pas ma he 'bros par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:507a-13: aom ma ma brda ne ma rda ya ma rda ya tsanda ma h'a ro sha na h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:507a-14: zhes pa 'dis sdig pa'i nad 'joms so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:507a-15: aom kro dha na sam kro dha ya sam kro dha ya sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:507a-16: zhes pa gshin rje'i gshed dmar po'i rgyud kyi rgyal por sngags kyi las rab 'byam gyi le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:507b-0: gtum po chen po khros pa zhes bya ba'i khro bo chen po'i dbang phyug de'i sngags kyi @507b las rab 'byams gsung du gsol /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:507b-1: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:507b-2: dpa' bo chen po mi g-yo ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:507b-3: 'jigs pa'i yang 'jigs par byed pa rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i dpa' bo ral gri dang sdigs mdzub 'chang ba gtum po khros pa chen po'i nga rgyal du byas nas sngags bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:507b-4: aom tsanda mah'a ro sha na h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:507b-5: ces pa'i gsang sngags chen po gang gi dpung par son cing gnas pa de bdud thams cad las nges par rgyal bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:507b-6: aom kro dha ne sam ko sha ne bhe da ne h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:507b-7: chu la mngon par bsngags nas sbyin par bya ste gzer sel bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:507b-8: aom santr'a a'a sa ne mo h'a ya h'um phat zhes pa 'dis spyi gtsug tu bcings na mi mthong ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:507b-9: aom aa tsa le sanytsa le che ge mo'i mu kham k'i la ya h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:507b-10: myos byed la gzugs brnyan byas nas gro ga la ba blas bris nas de'i khar bcug ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:507b-11: phur phus btab la lam bzhi mdor sba bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:507b-12: phyir rgol ba'i kha la phur bus gdab bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:507b-13: aom sarbba m'a ra bhanydza ne che ge mo'i b'a doo k'i la ya h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:507b-14: slar bzhin du snying gar bcug nas rkang pa dag la phur bus gdab par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:507b-15: 'gro ba dang 'ong ba rengs par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:507b-16: aom bi kram t'a na na s'a ra ba la bhanydza ne dzambha ya dzambha ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:507b-17: stambha ya stambha ya badzra b'a she na che ge mo see n+yam bandha bandha /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:507b-18: aom h'um phat kha: sha: h'a h'a h'i h'i phem phem aom tsanda mah'a ro sha na h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:508a-1: bcug nas sde'i bdag po'i gos la phur bus gdab ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:508a-2: gzugs brnyan kha 'og tu byas te sba bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:508a-3: pha rol gyi sde 'ong ba rengs par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:508a-4: aom da ha da ha pa tsa pa tsa ma tha ma tha /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:508a-6: dzv'a la ya dzv'a la ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:508a-7: gri hna grihna dzva la h'um aom tsanda ma h'a ro sha na h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:508a-8: dur khrod kyi gos la gzhan gyis mi thub pa sor mo brgyad kyi tshad la lha sbyin mngon par bris nas sngags kyi phreng bas bskor te myos byed gzugs brnyan gyi snying gar bcug nas shing la gzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:508a-10: aom tsanda ma h'a ro sha na che ge mo la dzva re na grihna pa ya h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:508a-11: zhes bzlas nas dur khrod kyi me la gdung bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:508a-12: seng ldeng dang rgya shug gi me la'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:508a-13: dgra rnams la rims byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:508a-14: aom dza ya dza ya pa ra dza ya ni rdzi ta ya ntra h'i h'i spho ta ya spho ta ya autstsh'a ta ya autstsh'a ta ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:508a-15: sh'i gham karma ku ru tsanda ma h'a ro sha na h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:508a-16: dur khrod kyi ras la bris nas skud pa sngon pos dkris nas dbur ma 'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:508a-19: rked par 'cang bar byed na gzhan gyi sngags rab tu mi 'byung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:508a-20: aom tsanda ma h'a se na gra sa gra sa kha kha kh'a hi kh'a hi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:508a-21: sho sha ya sho sha ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:508a-22: ma ra ma ra m'a ra ya m'a ra ya che ge mo aom phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:508b-0: dur khrod kyi ral pa bris nas sngar bzhin du gzugs brnyan du bcug ste sor mo'i tshad kyi rus pa'i phur pas @508b sam; lcags kyi phur pas phur bus btab nas dur khrod du kha 'og tu byas nas sbas na nyi ma bdun gyis 'chi bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:508b-1: aom tsanda ma h'a ro sha na che ge mo autstsha ta ya h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:508b-2: nim pa'i shing bya khva ta'i tshang na gnas pa blangs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:508b-3: dur khrod kyi mes bsreg par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:508b-4: de'i thal ba la brgya rtsa brgyad du mngon par bsngags te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:508b-5: khyim dang gos la gtor te gzhag go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:508b-6: rnga mo la zhon pa g-yon par byed pa'i zhags pas bcings nas lho'i phyogs su drangs par yid kyis bsam par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:508b-8: aom dve she dve she badzre che ge mos bi dve sha ya aom tsanda ma h'a ro sha na h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:508b-9: 'thab bzhin pa'i glang po dag gi rdul bzung nas bsgrub bya'i gzugs brnyan byas nas gnyis po la bsnun par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:508b-10: phan tshun sdang bar byad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:508b-11: aom tsanda ma h'a ro sha na hri: hri: hrem go ra r'u be na tsa ta tsa ta pra tsa ta pra tsa ta /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:508b-12: ha na ha na gh'a ta ya gh'a ta y'a kaddhya kaddhya pra sphu ra pra sphu ra /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:508b-13: pra sph'a ra ya pra sph'a ra ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:508b-14: k'i la ya k'i la ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:508b-16: stambha ya stambha ya che ge mo la h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:508b-17: gro ga la ta la'i smyu gus rus sbal sor drug par mnyam par bris nas rkang pa bzhi la hrim gi yi ge dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:508b-18: kha'i dbus su sht'i: yi ge'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:508b-20: de nas bris pa'i bsgrub bya de'i rgyab sngags kyi phreng ba gzhan gyis kun tu dkris te mchod na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:509a-0: de nas brtsams te 'dod pa yongs su nyams te rus sbal bzhin du mang pos yog par @509a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:509a-2: srad bu dmar pos kun tu dkris nas rkang pa rab tu bsdus nas mi 'degs par byas la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:509a-3: rkang pa g-yon pas gdeg par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:509a-4: che ge mo me ba sa m'a na ya lan bdun gyis dgra'i kha rengs par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:509a-6: mi li mi li n'a li te h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:509a-7: mig 'dzum pa nyams par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:509a-9: sho sha ya sho sha ya dha ra dha ra /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:509a-11: aom tsanda ma h'a ro sha na h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:509a-12: ro'i rus pa'i phur pa sor bdun pa'i ched la brgya rtsa brgyad du mngon par bsngags nas ba lang gnas su sbas na 'o ma mi 'dzag go //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:509a-13: aom ba li pattram ba ta ya su ra ba ri ma dzny'a pa ya ti dzv'a la ya dzv'a la ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:509a-14: aom tsanda ma h'a ro sha na h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:509a-15: grog mkhar gyi sa'i gong bu la brgya rtsa brgyad du mngon par bsngags te tshong pa'i khyim du sba bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:509a-17: aom hrim hrim tram bram ya ma ma tha ni a'a kaddhya a'a kaddhya ksho bha ya ksho bha ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:509a-18: sarb'a k'a ma pra s'a dha ne h'um h'um phat phat sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:509a-19: gro ga'i 'dab ma la gur gum dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:509a-20: yang dag par ldan pas lha phyag gnyis pa lag na zhags pa dang lcags kyu can 'dod pa drag cing 'jigs par byed pa bris la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:509a-21: glang po che'i chang dang zla mtshan dang me tog gi sngags kyis yi ge rnams spel bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:509b-0: de la sngags kyi phreng bas bskor nas khrag gis kun tu bkang @509b zhing; phye mar byas te skyes pa dang bud med kyi thod par bcu nas mar dang sbrang rtsis bkang ste myos byed kyi sa dang srad bu dmar pos dkris nas mgo bo'i gnas su sba bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:509b-1: rkang pa g-yon pas mnan nas bzlas par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:509b-2: stong phrag nyi shu rtsa lngas grong 'khrug par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:509b-3: aom a'a kaddhya a'a kaddhya mo ha ya mo ha ya che ge mo me ba ba sh'am bha ba tu sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:509b-4: lto ba'i srin bu phra mo'i phye ma dang khu ba dang ming med kyi khrag dag gis ba di ka byas nas mngon par bsngags te bza' ba dang btung ba la sbyin par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:509b-5: gyen du 'khor ba'i 'dab ma dag dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:509b-6: bung ba'i gshog pa dag dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:509b-7: rgyal po gnyis kyi so dag dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:509b-8: shi ba'i phreng ba rnam par btags pa'i phye ma 'dis rgyal ba'i lus can lus can gyi rjes nas rjes nas rgyug go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:509b-9: aom shve te gri dhri n'i kh'a hi bi shanytsa ru pi n'i kha: kha: aa ti mrittva dv'a re ts'i ra ka b'a b'a sa bant'a be sha: ha: ha: sa: sa: tsanda ma h'a ro sha na se na a'a dzny'a pa ya ti sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:509b-11: aom sam k'a ri ni tsam bam h'am ham h'um h'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:509b-12: dug thams cad 'joms par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:509b-13: aom n'a g'a ri b'a ma ne ha ra ha ra phat phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:509b-14: aom a'a ne k'a ne che ge mo ba sh'am ku ru sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:509b-15: dri bzang po can gyi me tog dkar po sbyin pa las dbang du byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:509b-16: na mo bi t'a g'a ya mee tri siddha lo tsa sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:510a-0: chu la mngon par bsngags nas des mig brkus pa las rab rib 'joms par byed @510a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:510a-1: do; ;aom ban kha kha tsurna kh'a n'a tan pra bha ba ti /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:510a-2: a'a dirya ra tha be ge na ba su de ba ba len tsa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:510a-3: ga ru da p'a kshi sa de na bh'u mya gatstsha bi sham sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:510a-5: karka ta la sogs pa'i dug 'joms par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:510a-6: aom ts'a munde aa dzi te aa pa r'a dzi te aa pa r'a ji te phu phu raksha raksha sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:510a-7: bong ba la lan bdun mngon par bsngags nas phyogs bzhir 'phang bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:510a-8: de bzhin du gcig gzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:510a-9: aom dzambha n'i stambha n'i mo ha n'i sarba dushta pra sh'a ma ni sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:510a-11: aom na ma: tsanda kro dh'a ya hu lu hu lu tishtha tishtha bandha bandha mo ha ya mo ha ya ha na ha na h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:510a-12: me tog la sogs pa la yongs su bzlas te byin pa la dbang du byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:510a-13: na mo ratna tra y'a ya aom ta: su: bisma re sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:510a-14: ke ta ki 'dab ma lus la bcangs na rims thams cad 'joms par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:510a-15: zhes pa gshin rje'i gshed dmar po'i rgyud du dpa' bo gcig pa'i sgrub thabs la sogs pa 'khrul 'khor dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:510a-16: sngags kyi le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:510a-18: bcom ldan 'das ltad mo nyan par 'tshal lo; ;sh'a kho ta ka'i rtsa ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:510a-19: ba ru ra'i rtsa ba gcig tu byas nas khyim du gzhag par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:510b-0: da dhu ra'i me tog gi dbus su gnas pa'i gunda ka dri bzang @510b po'i me tog gi dbus su bcug pa tsam gyis mgo la gzer 'byung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:510b-1: rtsab mos nyams par byas pas grol lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:510b-2: khyi mo'i mngal gyi mal stan des bdugs te bskor la rma bya'i mjug mas g-yas su bskor bas ri mo 'phrog go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:510b-3: g-yon du bskor ba yis thar ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:510b-4: khva ta'i snying khrag gis shing aa mra'i 'dab ma la de'i gzugs brnyan bri ba'i tshul gyis bris pa'i 'khrul 'khor gang gi bshang ba la bzhag pa de khva tas bza' bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:510b-5: bha ga'i rnam pas dong byas nas bud med kyi bshang ba dang sdig pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:510b-6: pattri ka dang ldan pa bcug nas byug par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:510b-7: de'i lam du gnod par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:510b-8: shing snu ha'i 'o mas bsgos pa'i til gyi til mar bskus pa las mgo skyes dkar por 'gyur ro; ;skra bzhar ba yis thar ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:510b-9: byi la mo'i phru ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:510b-10: mi mo'i phru ma dag gis bdugs pa las zla ba'i ri mo mi mthong bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:510b-11: sbrang rtsi'i bdugs pas thar ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:510b-14: skud pa la ba blas bskus nas lag pa la bskus nas nyi mar byas na ri mo mthong ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:510b-15: lag pa bkrus pa las thar ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:510b-16: bud med kyi phru ma'i bdugs pa las ri mo 'gebs par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:510b-17: gu gul gyis ba dugs pa las thar ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:510b-18: sbal pa'i zhun mar gyis mig sman las khyim du 'brel ba'i sbrul mthong ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:511a-1: mnal ba'i me la mu zi'i phye ma byin pa las 'bar bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:511a-2: shing sna hi'i rtsa ba dang bu ram zos na gnyid med par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:511a-3: k'a ma tsi'i rtsa ba gtsug tor du bcing bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:511a-5: klu 'dul bar byed pa drom ni'i me tog gi rtsa ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:511a-7: 'bras thug po che btags nas dril phyis byas pa las tshu yongs su zad pa las rgyal la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:511a-8: shing shal ma la'i rtsa ba la mtshal dang ldan pa zos pa las me tog ltung bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:511a-10: ma dir ya sbyin par bya ba'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:511a-11: yang tambu la yis rdul dang bral bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:511a-12: shing snu ha'i lo ma dang man ta'i sa bon dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:511a-13: gu na'i phye mas bu ram dang lhan cig zos pa las khrag ltung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:511a-14: tshu tshun dha ra'i phye mas rta'i sna la bskus na zas mi byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:511a-15: tsandan gyis bkrus pa las thar ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:511a-16: shing ke ta'i rtsa ba mgo la bcing bar bya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:511a-17: shing 'bra go'i rtsa ba lag pa la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:511a-18: shing ta la'i rtsa ba khu ru ma rgyal la gdon par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:511a-19: byang phyogs su bltas te gcer bu skra grol bar gyur nas gsum po rnams cung zad btags nas btung bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:511a-21: sho na ka'i sa bon dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:511b-0: p'u ra ka p'a du ka gnyis po sha pa'i pags pa'i khud du de mnyes te lce'i mthil du bzhag pa latta pa'i 'bras bu zos @511b ba las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:511b-1: sreg par mi byed do zhes gshin rje'i gshed dmar po'i rgyud du thun mong gi sman gyi le'u sti nyi shu pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:511b-3: ji ltar dus byed pa dang; sems can byed par nges pa de rnams kyi rgyu mtshan bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan du gsol /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:511b-4: rkang pa dang rkan la phug nas mig tu zug pa las zla ba gsum gyis grub bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:511b-5: rna bar phug pas zla ba bzhis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:511b-6: mdzod spur zug pa las nyi ma gcig gis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:511b-7: rkang pa dang rkan la phug nas lte bar zug pa las zla ba gsum gyis 'chi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:511b-8: rkang pa dang rkan la phug nas sna la zug pa las zla ba gsum gyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:511b-9: bshang ba rab tu 'dzag pa'i dus mtshungs par sbrid pa byung na lo gcig gis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:511b-10: shin tu dga' ba'i rab tu gal te sbrid pa byung ba dang mtshungs par mthe chung thams cad du zug pa las zla bas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:511b-11: snying dang mgrin par zug pa las phyogs gsum gyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:511b-12: mtshungs par rkan la gsum zug pa las nyi ma gsum gyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:511b-13: rkang pa'i mthe bong nas brtsams nas lte ba'i mthar thug par zug pa las zla ba drug gis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:511b-14: sna'i rtse mor zla bas de der gyur na mtshan mo bdun gyis 'chi pa'i dus su 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:511b-15: rna ba dag gi dril bu'i sgra las zla ba gsum gyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:512a-0: rna ba gnyis dang smin ma'i dbus dang klad pa'i rtse mo rnams su so so so sor zug @512a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:512a-1: pa las nyi ma gcig gis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:512a-2: sen mo la dmar pa'i mchog tu mthong ba las zla ba drug gis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:512a-3: so bskams pa las zla ba drug gis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:512a-4: byas pa shes par 'gyur ba nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:512a-5: rdo rje skyes bde bdag la gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:512a-7: ge sar sbrang rtsis brgyan pa mthong //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:512a-8: ae ma bde ba ldan pa'i zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:512a-9: chags pa sangs rgyas nye bar mdzes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:512a-10: chags can rnams kyis bde bzhi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:512a-11: rtog pa thams cad rnam par spangs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:512a-12: yid ni 'dod chags kyis dkrugs pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:512a-13: bud med gan rkyal bsgyel nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:512a-14: phrag par rkang pa zung byin nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:512a-15: 'og dang steng du ngas brtags nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:512a-16: de yi padma rgyas pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:512a-19: ldan par rdo rje de bcug nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:512a-20: ji ltar bdag gi nur nur po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:512a-21: bye ba nyis stong 'bum rnams kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:512a-22: dbus su sems la rab mchod bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:512a-23: bdag la rlung pad snying po las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:512a-24: snying po bla med rdo rje'i rtser //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:512a-26: blo ldan de der brjod smra byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:512a-27: slar yang sems dpa' gcig bsgom bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:512a-28: bde ba g-yo med dam pa'i sems //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:512a-29: de las so sor mchog sbyin nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:512a-30: dga' ba'i skad cig nyis 'gyur nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:512a-31: ji srid rab brjod 'di lta bu'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:512a-32: gzugs sku skad cig tsam bsam bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:512b-0: @512b bud med ri mo bskyed ma'ang zhig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:512b-1: 'gro ba rnams kyi yang gsum mo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:512b-2: bde ba sbyin pa zhi bar rig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:512b-3: cung zad 'dir ni rtog par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:512b-4: kha drag ched du sdig las gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:512b-5: de des gting dpag dka' ba can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:512b-6: du 'bod du ni rtag tu brdungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:512b-8: lus ni bskal pa gsum du gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:512b-9: bud med yon tan brjod ci dgos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:512b-10: sems can kun la yongs su 'dzin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:512b-11: snying rjes nyin mor byed pa las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:512b-12: bud med sems kyis so sor gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:512b-13: nub par gyur pa legs shes shing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:512b-14: yongs su shes pa'ang rgyas par byed; ;gal te de lta'i slong mo'i gzugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:512b-15: gzhan min rdo rje rnal 'byor ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:512b-16: de yi nub dang mthong ba ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:512b-17: sa dang sa la ring ba las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:512b-18: gang gis dran par byed tsam gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:512b-19: skad cig de las bde ba myong //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:512b-20: phyogs nyid yul dang bud med nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:512b-21: lha yi gzugs kyis yang dag gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:512b-22: phyag rgya de la phan byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:512b-23: yid ldan de la gnas par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:512b-24: de phyir skyon las rnam par grol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:512b-25: yon tan dam pa kun la mkhas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:512b-26: bsod nams bsod nams bsod nams che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:512b-27: rab dang byed pa mthar phyin can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:512b-28: de phyir de la brtan bltas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:512b-29: dam chu so yis btsir byas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:512b-30: rnal 'byor pa sh'ati sgrog byed cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:512b-31: de la'ang sta zur du bya ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:512b-32: rang bde 'byung ba bcing bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:512b-33: sa ma dampa ka nyid kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:513a-2: bung ba'i dra ba bcings pa yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:513a-4: de bzhin kho nar rul sbal gyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:513a-5: bcings pa'ang kun las bzang po nyid; ;de la skyil krung dbus su ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:513a-6: lnga gsum tsog pu'i gdan du ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:513a-7: byas nas dpung pa zung la ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:513a-8: de nas bcom ldan 'das ma yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:513a-9: bcom ldan 'das la dam po yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:513a-11: rgyas par byas nas rab gsol ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:513a-12: rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:513a-13: sgom pa ci lta bu zhig 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:513a-14: rnal 'byor pa rnams phan don du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:513a-15: zhus pa 'bras bu bcas par mdzod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:513a-17: rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor gang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:513a-19: nyin mtshan mnyam pa'i tshul du ni; ;sems gcig gis ni bsgom par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:513a-20: dge legs gang bsgom rtag bya ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:513a-21: srid pa'i ngo bos nges par rgyas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:513a-22: shin tu brtan zhing mngon sbyor bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:513a-23: ji bzhin kho nar gsal bar 'gro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:513a-24: de nas ma dang bu mo 'am //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:513a-25: rnal 'byor ma dang tsha mo dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:513a-26: gzhan yang nye du mo rnams kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:513a-27: gtum mo de bzhin bram ze mo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:513a-28: mi mo'i tshogs ni 'di dag sbyin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:513a-29: cho ga bzang pos kun bsnyen bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:513a-30: ji ltar dbye ba mi shes pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:513a-31: dbye bas rje btsun chog shes pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:513a-32: sgrub po mnar med 'khrid par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:513b-1: 'jig rten pha rol bden pa bcom //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:513b-2: de phyir kun tu rab 'bad pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:513b-3: blo bzang legs pas yang dag brtsam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:513b-4: mkha' 'gro ma sngags bzhin sbas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:513b-5: ji ltar sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:513b-6: yid dang rjes mthun phyogs su ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:513b-7: nye bar 'tshe ba kun spangs te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:513b-8: rang sems dga' ba'i 'dod pa mo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:513b-9: rab dang de dag yang dag blangs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:513b-10: dben zhing dub pa med byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:513b-11: ji srid rnyed pa'i gos dang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:513b-12: gnyis kyis brtan par bsgom par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:513b-13: blo bzang phan tshun sbyor ba las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:513b-14: bud med rang la mngon phyogs byas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:513b-15: zhugs nas gnyis dag phan tshun du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:513b-16: chags pas brtan par brtag par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:513b-17: de nas blta dang khar brjod pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:513b-18: rtse gcig yid kyis gnas par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:513b-19: de bzhin de nyid las brjod bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:513b-20: bden pa'i gzi brjid shin tu byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:513b-21: de yi bu dang khyim thab khyod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:513b-22: bdag la spun dang pha zhing pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:513b-23: khyod nga'i ma dang chung ma ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:513b-24: rnal 'byor ma dang tsha mo dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:513b-25: skyes bu bdun gyi 'bangs nga yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:513b-26: khyod zhal can gyi 'bangs dang bran //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:513b-27: smra ba de 'drar brjod par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:513b-28: bde ba gzi brjid byed pa'i mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:513b-29: khyod pa'i pha ma chung ma dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:513b-30: rnal 'byor ma dang tsha mo dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:513b-31: nga ni khyod kyi dus kun 'bangs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:513b-32: mdung thung rnon po mchog tu gzhol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:513b-33: brtse ba'i ma yis bdag la gzigs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:513b-34: bsnyen pa'i lta bas nges rtogs pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:513b-35: de bdag skyes bu mthong nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:514a-2: yi ge gsum ni ster bar byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:514a-3: rdo rje'i sbrang rtsi mtshungs pa'i khrag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:514a-5: mthong nas mig ni rnam par 'khrul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:514a-6: gdong yang dri yis byugs byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:514a-7: de nas nu mar btsir bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:514a-8: bstan par kun tu khar de'i khar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:514a-9: reg nas kha ru sbyin par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:514a-10: g-yo bar byed cing smra bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:514a-13: mthong phyir bza' ba rnam snang mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:514a-14: zla drug lte ba phyin ci log /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:514a-15: bu ga thams cad mthong ba'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:514a-16: ha yig reg cing mthong ba las phyogs gsum gyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:514a-17: ming med kyi rtsa bar ri mo nag po mthong ba las so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:514a-18: yan lag thams cad bsil bar mthong ba las nyi ma bcvo brgyad na'o; ;khrus byas pa byas ma thag bskams pa na nyi ma bcu yis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:514a-19: lus dri ngan pa las zla ba gnyis na'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:514a-20: gcin g-yon du 'khor ba las mtshan mo gsum gyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:514a-21: lus phra mor mthong bas zla ba drug gis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:514a-22: sna'i rtse mo ma mthong ba las nyi ma gcig la'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:514a-23: phyogs kyi 'di dag shes pa'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:514a-24: de bzhin rnal 'byor pa sgom dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:514a-25: bsam gtan brtson pas sngags bzlas bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:514a-27: bsrung ba lnga sogs bklog pa yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:514a-28: rang ngam gzhan gyis bya ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:514b-0: nyin rer tshogs @514b la zas dang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:514b-1: dge 'dun zas dang de bzhin gzhan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:514b-2: dman dang zhan la rjes brtse bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:514b-3: sems can rnams la rtag tu bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:514b-4: zhes pa sna tshogs rgyud du gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:514b-6: gshin rjer gshed dmar po'i rgyud du le'u nyi shu gcig pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:514b-8: mu stegs byed pa rnams thams cad la snying brtse ba med par 'dod pa'i don lhur len pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:514b-9: gang zhig ngag gdug pa thams cad du gsod pa lhur len pa de rnams kyi bsam pa la thugs brtse bar gyur pas de dag mnga' bdag gis bdag la gsung du gsol /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:514b-10: dang por gso sbyong sbyin par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:514b-11: phyi nas bslab pa'i gnas lnga sbyin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:514b-12: bye brag smra ba 'bad pas bslab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:514b-13: mdo sde pa yang de bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:514b-14: dag ba bcu la goms gyur cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:514b-15: bla ma la gus 'dul la mos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:514b-16: dbu ma'ang slob tu bcug nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:514b-17: sngags ni kun tu brtsam par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:514b-18: gsang las shin tu gsang ba'i rgyud //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:514b-19: myur du phun sum tshogs pa'i rgyu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:514b-20: cho ga'i sbyor ba 'dis myur du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:514b-21: bslab pa thos nas spyod yul bzang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:514b-22: bdud bzhi rnams spangs rnal 'byor pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:514b-23: lha yi sbyor bas gnas par bya; ;sta res gcod pa dang thod le kor byas nas nyi ma gzas zin pa'i dus su mi bskyod pas gtor te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:514b-24: de nas rkang pa gnyis kyis mnan nas sngags bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:515a-0: @515a *// gsang sngags 'bum phrag gcig bzlas na thig le 'ching ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:515a-1: gshin rje'i stobs su 'gro ste de gsal bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:515a-2: bdag gi gi lte bar sgom pa'i man ngag go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:515a-3: gang gang skad cig las brtsams te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:515a-4: de yi nyi mas bsgrub par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:515a-5: nyi ma lnga yi mthar thug bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:515a-6: log par smra ba'i 'jig rten las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:515a-7: legs spas rab tu gsal ba ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:515a-9: rnal 'byor ma kun de nyid bstan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:515a-12: brtul po yis ni 'bum phrag lnga //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:515a-13: gang zhig rgyud du gsungs rang gi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:515a-14: rang bzhin las ni 'bum phrag bzhi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:515a-15: de nas shin tu chung ba 'di //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:515a-16: lha mo de kun gsal bar bstan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:515a-17: dpal ldan gshin rje'i gshed dmar po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po le'u nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:515a-18: rang gi rgyud 'di mi shes par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:515a-19: rgyud dang rgyud du nges brjod pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:515a-20: gal te 'tsho ba'i bsam pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:515a-21: stong pa'i sa la de 'khor ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:515a-22: dpal ldan gshin rje'i gshed dmar po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:515a-23: skad gnyis smra ba chen po thar pa lotstsha ba'i bka' drin gyis bskyangs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:515b-0: bod kyi lotstsha ba sh'akya'i dge @515b slong rin chen grub kyis /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:515b-1: chos kyi rje khro phu lotstsha ba'i gdan sa gnas gsar dgon par bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:515b-2: rgyud 'di 'gyur las 'bad ba'i bsod nams kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:515b-3: nag po'i rtsa lag ma lus kun bcom ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:515b-4: bstan pa'i bya ba yid bzhin 'grub pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:515b-5: mthar thug 'jam pa'i rdo rje nyid gyur cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:515b-6: rgyud 'di nyid snar thang bka' 'gyur dkar chag nang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:515b-7: gshed dmar gyi rgyud le'u nyer gnyis pa bu ston rin po ches bsgyur ba zhig yod kyang 'dir med ces gsal ba sde dge mtshal par ma nas thon pas khungs dag yin min bu ston thams cad mkhyen pa'i gsung la zhib brtags skabs /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:515b-9: chos 'byung gsung rab rin po che'i mdzod nang ma 'khod kyang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:515b-10: rgyud sde spyi'i rnam gzhag rgyas pa rgyud sde rin po che'i mdzes rgyan du rgyud 'di dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:515b-11: le'u bcu dgu pa gnyis char gyi le'u'i grangs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:515b-12: de dag so so'i bstan don gsal bar gsungs 'dug pas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:516a-0: kun mkhyen rin chen grub pa de nyid gangs can lo pan mkhas grub mtshan ldan rtsod med yongs grags la brten rang gsung la dag ther gtan 'phebs dang 'brel bu ston gyis rang 'gyur mdzad ces pa'i rgyud 'di da lam rten 'brel phun sum tshogs @516a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-025:516a-1: pa'i yan lag tu gsar bcug bgyis pa'o //
